trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for controls, which are components with visual representation.
trans-unit.target: Definerer basisklasse for kontroller, som er komponenter med visuelle representasjonen.

trans-unit.source: To create your own control class, inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>, Control classes, or from the other Windows Forms provided controls.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette dine egne klasse for knappekontrollen arve fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>, kontrollerer klasser eller angitt kontroller fra den andre Windows-skjemaer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om egendefinerte kontroller for redigering, se [utvikler egendefinert Windows Forms-kontroller med .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The Control class implements very basic functionality required by classes that display information to the user.
trans-unit.target: Klasse for knappekontrollen implementerer grunnleggende funksjonaliteten som kreves av klasser som viser informasjon for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: It handles user input through the keyboard and pointing devices.
trans-unit.target: Den håndterer brukerinndata gjennom tastatur og peker enheter.

trans-unit.source: It handles message routing and security.
trans-unit.target: Den håndterer ruting av meldinger og sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: It defines the bounds of a control (its position and size), although it does not implement painting.
trans-unit.target: Den definerer grensene for en kontroll (den plassering og størrelse), selv om den ikke implementerer malingen fullføres.

trans-unit.source: It provides a window handle (`hWnd`).
trans-unit.target: Det gir et vindushåndtak (`hWnd`).

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms controls use ambient properties so child controls can appear like their surrounding environment.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms Kontroller Bruk omsluttende egenskaper slik underordnede kontroller kan vises som miljøet omkringliggende.

trans-unit.source: An *ambient property* is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: En *omkringliggende egenskapen* er en kontrollegenskap som, hvis ikke angitt, er hentet fra den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the control does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>, and the property is not set, the control attempts to determine the value of the ambient property through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Site%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen ikke har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>, og egenskapen er ikke angitt, kontrollen prøver å bestemme verdien for egenskapen omkringliggende via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Site%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Site%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control is not sited, if the site does not support ambient properties, or if the property is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>, the control uses its own default values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen ikke er plassert, hvis webområdet ikke støtter omsluttende egenskaper, eller hvis egenskapen ikke er angitt for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>, kontrollen bruker sine egne standardverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Typically, an ambient property represents a characteristic of a control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, that is communicated to a child control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis en omkringliggende egenskapen representerer en egenskap for en kontroll som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, som kommunisert til en underordnet kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>har samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>som sitt overordnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: Ambient properties provided by the Controlclass include: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Omsluttende egenskaper som er angitt av Controlclass inkluderer: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To make your Windows Forms application support visual styles, be sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> property to `System` and include a manifest with your executable.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å gjøre det Windows Forms-programmet støtter visuelle stiler, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>egenskapen `System` med et manifest med den kjørbare filen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: A manifest is an XML file that is included either as a resource within your application executable or as a separate file that resides in the same directory as the executable file.
trans-unit.target: En manifestfilen er en XML-fil som er inkludert som en ressurs i den kjørbare filen for programmet eller en egen fil som finnes i samme mappe som den kjørbare filen.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a manifest, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på et manifest i avsnittet eksempel for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using visual styles, see[Visual Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker visuelle stiler[visuelle stiler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications such as screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms har innebygd støtte for tilgjengelighet og gir informasjon om programmet som gjør det mulig å arbeide med tilgjengelighet klientprogrammer som skjermforstørrer og kontrolløren verktøy, stemme inndatakode verktøy, på skjermen tastatur, alternative inndata enheter og tastatur forbedring verktøy.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Noen ganger vil tilleggsinformasjon for tilgjengelighet klienprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: Det er to måter for å gi denne informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>egenskapsverdier som rapporteres til tilgjengelighet klientprogrammer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to provide limited accessibility information for existing controls.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis til å angi begrenset tilgjengelighetsinformasjon for eksisterende kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can write your own class deriving from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes, providing as much accessibility information as needed.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også skrive en klasse som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>klasser, å gi så mye tilgjengelighetsinformasjon etter behov.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To maintain better performance, do not set the size of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du vil beholde bedre ytelse, ikke angir størrelsen på en kontroll i sin konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den foretrukne metoden er å overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not add data bindings for a Control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke legge til databindinger for en kontroll i sin konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: Doing so will cause errors in code generation and can cause unwanted behavior.
trans-unit.target: Gjør dette vil føre til feil i kodegenerering og kan føre til uønsket virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: The majority of the controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespace use the underlying Windows common control as a base to build on.
trans-unit.target: Fleste kontrollene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms>navneområdet bruke underliggende Windows vanlige kontrollen som basis for å bygge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Windows common controls, see[General Control Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om Windows vanlige kontrollene[generelle kontrollen referanse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx).

trans-unit.source: To identify Windows Forms controls from a separate process, use a standard `SendMessage` call to pass the WM_GETCONTROLNAME message.
trans-unit.target: For å identifisere Windows Forms-kontroller fra en annen prosess, kan du bruke en standard `SendMessage` kall til å sende meldingen WM_GETCONTROLNAME.

trans-unit.source: WM_GETCONTROLNAME is independent of the language and Windows hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: WM_GETCONTROLNAME er uavhengig av språket og Windows hierarki.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Recommended Solution for Windows Forms" topic in[Automating Windows Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon, se emnet "Anbefalt løsning for Windows Forms" i[automatisering Windows Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property to synchronize access to the control from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>til å synkronisere tilgang til kontrollen fra flere tråder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om flere tråder Windows Forms-Kontroller [slik: Kontroller sikker kall til Windows Forms-kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> class with default settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> klassen med standardinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class is the base class for all controls used in a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen er basisklasse for alle kontroller som brukes i et Windows Forms-program.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this constructor is typically not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er ikke vanligvis brukes til å opprette en forekomst av klassen, vanligvis kalles ikke direkte denne konstruktøren, men i stedet kalles av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> klasse bestemt tekst.

trans-unit.target: Første <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>kontrollens fastsettes av den `left`, `top`, `width` og `height` parameterverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessibility client applications of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref> for the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Varsler tilgjengelighet klientprogrammer for det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"> </xref> for den angitte underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> the accessibility client applications are to be notified of.
trans-unit.target: Du må kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden for hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>tilgjengelighet klientprogrammer som skal varsles på.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>metoden kalles vanligvis når en egenskap som er angitt eller fra en hendelsesbehandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method and pass in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>metoden og pass i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>verdien `Hide` fra i hendelsesbehandlingen for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"> </xref> til å varsle tilgjengelighet klientprogrammer for.

trans-unit.source: The child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to notify of the accessible event.
trans-unit.target: Underordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> til å varsle om hendelsen tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessibility client applications of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref> for the specified child control .
trans-unit.target: Varsler tilgjengelighet klientprogrammer for det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"> </xref> for den angitte underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"> </xref> til å varsle tilgjengelighet klientprogrammer for.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to notify of the accessible event.
trans-unit.target: Underordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> til å varsle om hendelsen tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> tilordnet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å styre forekomsten ble returnert fra denne metoden, eller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>som er tilordnet til kontrollen, opprettes en ny forekomst av en.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the AccessibilityObject property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å hente eller angi egenskapen AccessibilityObject, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samlingen er installert med den[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see [Active Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om tilgjengelig objekter, se [aktiv tilgjengelighet](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592.aspx).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> tilordnet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standard handlingen beskrivelsen av kontrollen for bruk av tilgjengelighet klientprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: An object's AccessibleDefaultActionDescription property describes the object's primary method of manipulation from the user's viewpoint.
trans-unit.target: Et objekts AccessibleDefaultActionDescription egenskapen beskriver objektets primære av redigeringen fra brukerens synspunktet.

trans-unit.source: This property should be a verb or a short verb phrase.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må være et verb eller en kort verb-setning.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, such as in the following examples: - A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked."
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke alle objekter har handlinger som standard, og enkelte objekter kan ha en standardhandling som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen eksempel i følgende eksempler:-et merke har en standardhandling av "Fjern merket" og "Avmerket." verdien</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked."
trans-unit.target: -Merket av for har en standardhandling for "Søk" og verdien "Fjernet."

trans-unit.source: - A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value.
trans-unit.target: – En knapp "Ut" har en standardhandling for "Trykk" uten noen verdi.

trans-unit.source: - A label or a text box control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer."
trans-unit.target: – En etikett eller en tekstbokskontroll som viser "Skriver" har ingen standardhandling, men har verdien "Skriver."

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om egenskapene til tilgjengelig objekter, se [innhold beskrivende egenskaper for](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).

trans-unit.source: The default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Standard handlingen beskrivelsen av kontrollen for bruk med klientprogrammer for tilgjengelighet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir beskrivelsen av kontrollen som brukes av klientprogrammer for tilgjengelighet.

trans-unit.source: An object's AccessibleDescription property provides a textual description about an object's visual appearance.
trans-unit.target: Et objekts AccessibleDescription egenskapen gir en beskrivelse om et objekts utseendet.

trans-unit.source: The description is primarily used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users, but can also be used for context searching or other applications.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelsen brukes først og fremst for å gi større konteksten lav visuelt eller blinde brukere, men kan også brukes til å søke i konteksten eller andre programmer.

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleDescription property is needed if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AccessibleDescription er nødvendig hvis beskrivelsen ikke tydelig, eller hvis den er overflødig basert på objektets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a button with "OK" would not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en knapp med "OK" trenger mer informasjon, men en knapp som viser et bilde av en Kaktus vil.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> (and perhaps <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A>) properties for the cactus button would describe its purpose, but the AccessibleDescription property would convey information that is less tangible, such as "A button that shows a picture of a cactus."
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>(og kanskje <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A>) egenskaper for knappen Kaktus vil beskriver formålet, men egenskapen AccessibleDescription vil formidle informasjon som er mindre konkrete, for eksempel "En-knappen som viser et bilde av en Kaktus."</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om egenskapene til tilgjengelig objekter, se [innhold beskrivende egenskaper for](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).

trans-unit.source: The description of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelsen av kontrollen som brukes av klientprogrammer for tilgjengelighet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på kontrollen som brukes av klientprogrammer for tilgjengelighet.

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleName property is a label that briefly describes and identifies the object within its container, such as the text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, or a label displayed next to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AccessibleName er en etikett som kort beskriver og identifiserer objektet i beholderen, for eksempel teksten i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, navnet på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, eller en etikett Neste for å vise en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see the "[Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om egenskapene til objekter som er tilgjengelig i den "[innhold beskrivende egenskapene](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).

trans-unit.source: The name of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kontrollen som brukes av klientprogrammer for tilgjengelighet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accessible role of the control
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir rollen tilgjengelig for kontrollen

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleRole property describes what kind of user interface element an object is.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AccessibleRole beskriver hva slags element i brukergrensesnittet et objekt.

trans-unit.source: If the control's role cannot be determined, the AccessibleRole property is set to `Default`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollens rolle ikke kan fastslås, AccessibleRole-egenskapen er satt til `Default`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om egenskapene til tilgjengelig objekter, se [innhold beskrivende egenskaper for](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can accept data that the user drags onto it.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen godtar data som brukeren drar til den.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drag-and-drop operations are allowed in the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dra og slipp-operasjoner er tillatt i kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a control is bound and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kanter i en beholder som en kontroll er bundet og bestemmer hvordan en kontroll endres med sin overordnede.

trans-unit.source: Use the Anchor property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ankeret til definerer hvordan en kontroll endrer størrelse automatisk når den overordnede kontrollen endrer størrelse.

trans-unit.source: Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Forankring tilgangskontroll til som den overordnede kontrollen sikrer at forankret kantene forbli i samme posisjon i forhold til kantene kontrollens overordnede når den overordnede kontrollen endres.

trans-unit.source: You can anchor a control to one or more edges of its container.
trans-unit.target: Du kan forankre en kontroll til én eller flere kantene i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> whose Anchor property value is set to `Top` and `Bottom`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is stretched to maintain the anchored distance to the top and bottom edges of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is increased.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>der ankeret egenskapsverdien er satt til `Top` og `Bottom`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>strekkes for å beholde forankret avstanden til venstre og høyre kant av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>økes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Anchor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I ankeret og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>Egenskaper utelukker hverandre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Bare én kan angis samtidig, og den siste som er satt prioriteres.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets where this control is scrolled to in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir der kontrollen er rullet til i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> specifying the scroll location.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> å angi scroll plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard er det øvre venstre hjørnet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gjelder ikke for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gjelder ikke for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen bakgrunnsfarge støtter ikke gjennomsiktige farger med mindre den `SupportsTransparentBackColor` verdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen bakgrunnsfarge er en omkringliggende egenskap.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: En omkringliggende egenskapen er en kontrollegenskap som, hvis ikke angitt, er hentet fra den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same BackColor as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>har samme bakgrunnsfarge som sitt overordnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om omsluttende egenskaper i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>klassen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer bakgrunnsfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard er verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsbildet vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: - Use the BackgroundImage property to place a graphic image onto a control.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk BackgroundImage-egenskapen til å plassere et bilde på en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Images with translucent or transparent colors are not supported by Windows Forms controls as background images.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bilder med gjennomsiktig eller gjennomsiktig farger støttes ikke av Windows Forms-kontroller som bakgrunn.

trans-unit.source: > > This property is not supported on child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: >> Denne egenskapen støttes ikke på underordnet kontrollerer der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> som representerer bildet som skal vises i bakgrunnen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen bildet oppsettet som er definert i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackgroundImageLayout property to specify the position and behavior of an image you have placed onto a control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BackgroundImageLayout-egenskapen til å angi plasseringen og virkemåten til et bilde som du har satt til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: BackgroundImageLayout takes effect only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: BackgroundImageLayout trer i kraft bare hvis det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can increase performance for large images if you set BackgroundImageLayout to something other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan øke ytelse for store bilder hvis du setter BackgroundImageLayout til noe annet enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout>

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> , <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> , <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>).

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> is the default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>er standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: The specified enumeration value does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte opplistingsverdien finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property changes either programmatically or by user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>egenskapen endres programmatisk eller av brukeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de angitte representanten asynkront på tråd kontrollens underliggende referanse ble opprettet på.

trans-unit.source: The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Representanten kalles asynkront, og denne metoden returnerer umiddelbart.

trans-unit.source: You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kalle denne metoden fra en tråd, selv tråden som eier kontrollens referanse.

trans-unit.source: If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollens referanse ikke finnes ennå, søker denne metoden opp kontrollens overordnede kjede til det finner en kontroll- eller som har et vindushåndtak.

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, BeginInvoke will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du finner ingen passende referanse, Iverksett BeginInvoke et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler.
trans-unit.target: Unntak i metoden representanten regnes untrapped og vil bli sendt til programmets untrapped unntak behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>til å hente returverdien fra representanten, hvis nødvendig, men det er nødvendig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> will block until the return value can be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>blokkerer før returverdien kan hentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > De fleste metoder for en kontroll kan bare kalles fra tråd der kontrollen ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, BeginInvoke, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>egenskapen fire metoder på en kontroll som gir sikre tråder: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, BeginInvoke, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>Hvis referansen for kontrollen som allerede er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>før kontrollens referanse er opprettet på en bakgrunnstråd kan føre til ugyldig på tvers av tråd anrop.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre metodekall, bør du bruke én av metodene invoke for å formidle kallet til kontrollens tråd.

trans-unit.source: The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: Aktiver metodene aktivere alltid deres tilbakeringinger på kontrollens tråd.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan bli utløst et unntak hvis tråden som skal behandle meldingen er ikke lenger aktiv.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes no parameters.
trans-unit.target: En representant til en metode som bruker uten parametere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the result of the BeginInvoke operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som representerer resultatet av operasjonen BeginInvoke.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: No appropriate window handle can be found.
trans-unit.target: Finner ingen passende vindusreferanse.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified arguments, on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de angitte representanten asynkront med de angitte argumentene på tråd kontrollens underliggende referanse ble opprettet på.

trans-unit.source: The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Representanten kalles asynkront, og denne metoden returnerer umiddelbart.

trans-unit.source: You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kalle denne metoden fra en tråd, selv tråden som eier kontrollens referanse.

trans-unit.source: If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollens referanse ikke finnes ennå, søker denne metoden opp kontrollens overordnede kjede til det finner en kontroll- eller som har et vindushåndtak.

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du finner ingen passende referanse, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>vil Iverksett et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler.
trans-unit.target: Unntak i metoden representanten regnes untrapped og vil bli sendt til programmets untrapped unntak behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>til å hente returverdien fra representanten, hvis nødvendig, men det er nødvendig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> will block until the return value can be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>blokkerer før returverdien kan hentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > De fleste metoder for en kontroll kan bare kalles fra tråd der kontrollen ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>egenskapen fire metoder på en kontroll som gir sikre tråder: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>Hvis referansen for kontrollen som allerede er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>før kontrollens referanse er opprettet på en bakgrunnstråd kan føre til ugyldig på tvers av tråd anrop.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre metodekall, bør du bruke én av metodene invoke for å formidle kallet til kontrollens tråd.

trans-unit.source: The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: Aktiver metodene aktivere alltid deres tilbakeringinger på kontrollens tråd.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan bli utløst et unntak hvis tråden som skal behandle meldingen er ikke lenger aktiv.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes parameters of the same number and type that are contained in the `args` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Representant til en metode som bruker parametere for samme antall og type som finnes i den `args` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av objekter skal sendes som argumenter til den angitte metoden.

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no arguments are needed.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis noen argumenter er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the result of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*> operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som representerer resultatet av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*>operasjonen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: No appropriate window handle can be found.
trans-unit.target: Finner ingen passende vindusreferanse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is used to return a single<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for all data-bound controls contained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>brukes til å returnere en enkelt<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for alle databundet kontroller finnes i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> keeps all controls that are bound to the same data source synchronized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>beholder alle kontrollene som er bundet til samme datakilde synkronisert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> specifies the item in the underlying list that all data-bound controls point to.
trans-unit.target: Angi for eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>angir elementet i den underliggende listen alle databundet Kontroller instruerer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and assigning it to the BindingContext property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>og tilordne den til egenskapen BindingContext se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref> egenskapsendringer.

trans-unit.source: To add a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Legge til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>egenskapen se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property is changed is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>-egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in pixels, between the bottom edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden i piksler mellom nederste kant av kontrollen og den øvre kanten for klienten for til beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is equal to the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property value, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er lik summen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>egenskapsverdien, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Bottom property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen nederste er en skrivebeskyttet egenskap.

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate this property value by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> properties or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre denne egenskapsverdien ved å endre verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>Egenskaper og kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the bottom edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som representerer avstanden i piksler mellom nederste kant av kontrollen og øverste kant av til beholderen klienten diagramområdet.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size and location of the control including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen og plasseringen av kontrollen inkludert nonclient elementene, i piksler i forhold til den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The bounds of the control include the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus.
trans-unit.target: Grensene for kontrollen inkluderer nonclient-elementer som side-felt, kantlinjer, tittellinjer og menyer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> method is called to set the Bounds property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>metoden kalles for å angi egenskapen grensene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Boundsproperty is not always changed through its `set` method so you should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> method to ensure that your code is executed when the Bounds property is set.
trans-unit.target: Boundsproperty ikke alltid endres via den `set` metoden slik at du kan overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>metode for å sikre at koden er utført når grensene-egenskapen er satt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in pixels relative to the parent control that represents the size and location of the control including its nonclient elements.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> i piksler i forhold til den overordnede kontrollen som representerer størrelsen og plasseringen av kontrollen inkludert nonclient elementene.

trans-unit.source: Brings the control to the front of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Gir kontrollen i starten av z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The control is moved to the front of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen er flyttet til starten av z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the front of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er en underordnet av en annen kontroll, flyttes den underordnede kontrollen i starten av z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: BringToFront does not make a control a top-level control, and it does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: BringToFront gjør ikke en kontroll på øverste nivå kontrollen, og den ikke heve den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*> property can be set to an active value, to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>egenskapen kan settes til en aktiv verdi å aktivere støtte for IME.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override this property to return `false` if IME is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser kan overstyre denne til å returnere `false` Hvis IME ikke støttes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can receive focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen kan motta fokus.

trans-unit.source: In order for a control to receive input focus, the control must have a handle assigned to it, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> properties must both be set to `true` for both the control and all its parent controls, and the control must be a form or the control's outermost parent must be a form.
trans-unit.target: For en kontroll skal være inndata fokus, kontrollen må ha et håndtak tilordnet, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>Egenskaper må begge settes til `true` for kontrollen og alle overordnede kontroller og kontrollen må være et skjema eller kontrollen er ytterste overordnet må være et skjema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can receive focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen kan motta fokus. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if events can be raised on the control.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om hendelser kan oppstå kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If this control is being hosted as an ActiveX control, this property will return `false` if the ActiveX control has its events frozen.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne kontrollen som driftes som en ActiveX-kontroll, egenskapen tilbakestiller `false` hvis ActiveX-kontrollen har sine hendelser som er låst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is hosted as an ActiveX control whose events are not frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er vert for som en ActiveX-kontroll med hendelser ikke er informasjonen til høyre. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen kan velges.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` if the `Selectable` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`, is contained in another control, the control itself is visible and enabled, and all its parent controls are visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer `true` hvis den `Selectable` verdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `true`er finnes i en annen kontroll, selve kontrollen er synlig og aktivert og alle overordnede kontroller er synlige og aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable and will return a value of `false` for the CanSelect property.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms-kontroller i følgende liste er ikke valgbar og returnerer verdien `false` for egenskapen CanSelect.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from these controls are also not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller avledet fra disse kontrollene er heller ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(når det er ingen kobling finnes i kontrollen)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can be selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen kan velges; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has captured the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen har fanget opp musen.

trans-unit.source: When a control has captured the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: Når en kontroll har fanget musen, mottar musen inndataene hvorvidt markøren er innenfor grensene.

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically only captured during drag operations.
trans-unit.target: Musen er vanligvis bare registrert under dra operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Only the foreground window can capture the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Bare vinduet forgrunnen kan registrere musen.

trans-unit.source: When a background window attempts to do so, the window receives messages only for mouse events that occur when the mouse cursor is within the visible portion of the window.
trans-unit.target: Når et bakgrunnsbilde vindu forsøker å gjøre dette, mottar vinduet meldinger bare for musen hendelser som forekommer når markøren er innenfor den synlige delen av vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Also, even if the foreground window has captured the mouse, the user can still click another window, bringing it to the foreground.
trans-unit.target: Også, selv om vinduet forgrunnen har fanget musen, brukeren kan fortsatt klikke et nytt vindu, fører det til forgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: When the mouse is captured, shortcut keys should not work.
trans-unit.target: Når musen er lagret, må ikke hurtigtaster fungerer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has captured the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen har fanget opp musen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control causes validation to be performed on any controls that require validation when it receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen får valideringen skal utføres på en kontroller som krever validering når den mottar fokus.

trans-unit.source: If the CausesValidation property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CausesValidation-egenskapen er satt til `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>hendelser er undertrykt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: The CausesValidation property value is typically set to `false` for controls such as a Help button.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien CausesValidation vanligvis er satt til `false` for kontroller som en Hjelp-knappen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control causes validation to be performed on any controls requiring validation when it receives focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen får valideringen skal utføres på kontroller som krever validering når den mottar fokus. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the focus or keyboard user interface (UI) cues change.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når fokus eller tastaturet brukergrensesnittet (UI) bunke-ikoner endringen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to catch calls on the wrong thread that access a control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*> property when an application is being debugged.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om å fange opp kall på feil tråd tilgang til en kontroll <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>når et program som feilsøking.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: When a thread other than the creating thread of a control tries to access one of that control's methods or properties, it often leads to unpredictable results.
trans-unit.target: Når en annen tråd enn opprette tråd for en kontroll prøver å få tilgang til én av metodene eller egenskaper som kontrollerer, fører det ofte til uventede resultater.

trans-unit.source: A common invalid thread activity is a call on the wrong thread that accesses the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig ugyldig tråd aktivitet er en oppringing på feil tråd som har tilgang til kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set CheckForIllegalCrossThreadCalls to `true` to find and diagnose this thread activity more easily while debugging.
trans-unit.target: WantDestinationQueue CheckForIllegalCrossThreadCalls `true` å finne og diagnostisere denne aktiviteten tråd lettere under feilsøking.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if calls on the wrong thread are caught; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kall på feil tråd er à; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The Click event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Klikk-hendelsen sender en <xref:System.EventArgs>til hendelsesbehandlingen så bare indikerer at det har oppstått et klikk.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger mer spesifikke musen informasjon (knappen, antall Klikk, hjulet rotasjon eller plassering), kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>vil ikke starter hendelsen hvis Klikk skyldes handling enn med musen, for eksempel å trykke ENTER-tasten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Dobbeltklikk bestemmes av innstillinger for mus av brukerens operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan angi tiden mellom Klikk museklikk som Dobbeltklikk i stedet for to Klikk.

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised every time a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Klikk denne hendelsen oppstår hver gang en kontroll er dobbeltklikker.
