trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har hendelsesbehandling for Klikk for eksempel og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>hendelser i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, klikk og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>hendelser registreres når skjemaet er dobbeltklikker og begge metodene kalles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the Click event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en kontroll er dobbeltklikker og at kontrollen ikke støtter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>hendelse, klikk hendelse kan oppstå to ganger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: You must set the `StandardClick` value of<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to `true` for this event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi den `StandardClick` verdien<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> til `true` for denne-hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: Click, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Følgende hendelser, ikke aktiveres den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>klasse med mindre det er minst én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling: Klikk <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes minst én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>i samlingen, og brukeren samhandler med egenskapen overskriften (der den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>navnene vises), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>opphøyer riktig hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis brukeren samhandling er innenfor klientområdet i kategorisiden den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>opphøyer riktig hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter rektanglet som representerer klientområdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus.
trans-unit.target: Klientområdet for en kontroll er grensene for kontrollen, minus nonclient-elementer som side-felt, kantlinjer, tittellinjer og menyer.

trans-unit.source: Because client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the client area of the control, the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle returned by this property are (0,0).
trans-unit.target: Fordi klienten koordinatene er i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet på klienten for kontrollen, er koordinatene for øvre venstre hjørne av rektanglet returneres av denne egenskapen (0,0).

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the size and coordinates of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen hente størrelse og koordinater på klienten for kontrollen for oppgaver som tegning på overflate for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om tegning på kontroller [gjengivelse av en Windows Forms-kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer klientområdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height and width of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden og bredden på klienten for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus.
trans-unit.target: Klientområdet for en kontroll er grensene for kontrollen, minus nonclient-elementer som side-felt, kantlinjer, tittellinjer og menyer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> method is called to set the ClientSizeproperty.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>metoden kalles for å angi ClientSizeproperty.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ClientSize property is not always changed through its `set` method so you should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> method to ensure that your code is executed when the ClientSize property is set.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ClientSize ikke alltid endres via den `set` metoden slik at du kan overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>metode for å sikre at koden er utført når egenskapen ClientSize er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties represent the width and height of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper representerer bredden og høyden på klienten for kontrollen.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the size of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å hente størrelsen på klienten for kontrollen for oppgaver som tegning på overflate for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om tegning på kontroller [gjengivelse av en Windows Forms-kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot bind application settings to this property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan ikke binde programinnstillinger for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: For more information on application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon på programinnstillinger [oversikt over programmet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the dimensions of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer dimensjonene på klienten for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the company or creator of the application containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på selskapet eller oppretteren av programmet som inneholder kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CompanyName property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen firmanavn er en skrivebeskyttet egenskap.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of this property, set the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute.Company%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute.Company%2A>egenskapsverdien for <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute>.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute> </xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute.Company%2A> for å endre verdien for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the CompanyName property.
trans-unit.target: De følgende kodelinjen C# egenskapen firmanavn.

trans-unit.source: ```c# [assembly: AssemblyCompany("Microsoft")] ``` > [!NOTE] > It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version for your app.
trans-unit.target: ```c# [assembly: AssemblyCompany("Microsoft")] ``` > [!NOTE]> Det anbefales at du oppgir firmanavn, produktnavn og produktversjon for appen din.

trans-unit.source: The company name or creator of the application containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Firmanavnet eller oppretteren av programmet som inneholder kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating whether the specified control is a child of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den angitte kontrollen er en underordnet av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> skal evalueres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified control is a child of the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte kontrollen er en underordnet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control, or one of its child controls, currently has the input focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen eller en av de underordnede kontrollene har det angitte fokuset.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a control or any of the controls contained within it has the input focus.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen for å finne ut om en kontroll av eller alle kontrollene innenfor den har inndata fokus.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the control has focus, regardless of whether any of its child controls have focus, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å finne ut om kontrollen har fokus, uavhengig om noen av de underordnede kontrollene har fokus, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>

trans-unit.source: To give a control the input focus, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gi en kontroll inndata fokus, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control or one of its child controls currently has the input focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om kontrollen eller en av underordnet kontrollerer for øyeblikket har inndata fokus. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hurtigmenyen tilknyttet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use a shortcut menus to give context-specific menu options to users when they right-click on the control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en hurtigmenyer for å gi kontekstavhengige menyalternativer til brukere når de høyreklikker kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> that represents the shortcut menu associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref> som representerer hurtigmenyen tilknyttet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> has also been assigned to the control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>også er tilordnet til kontroll, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>overstyrer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> for this control, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> for denne kontrollen, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det er ingen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en ny kontroll legges til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en kontroll fjernes fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of controls contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av kontroller i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> can act as a parent to a collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>kan fungere som en foresatt i en samling av kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, when several controls are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, each of the controls is a member of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the Controls property of the form, which is derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når flere kontroller er lagt til i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>hver av kontrollene er medlem av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>tilordnet kontroller-egenskapen for skjemaet, som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate the controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the Controls property by using the methods available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre kontrollene i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>tilordnet kontroller-egenskapen ved hjelp av metodene som er tilgjengelig i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til flere kontroller til en overordnet kontroll, anbefales det at du ringer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>metoden før du starter kontrollene som skal legges til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Etter at kontrollene er lagt til den overordnede kontrollen, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Doing so will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil øke ytelsen for programmer med mange kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Use the Controls property to iterate through all controls of a form, including nested controls.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen kontroller for å gå gjennom alle kontroller av et skjema, inkludert nestede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetNextControl%2A> method to retrieve the previous or next child control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetNextControl%2A>metode for å hente den forrige eller neste underordnede kontrollen i kategorien rekkefølge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetNextControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to get or set the active control of a container control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>til å hente eller angi den aktive kontrollen i en beholderkontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> representing the collection of controls contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>som representerer samlingen av kontroller i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt tilgjengelighet-objekt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke eksplisitt kalle metoden CreateAccessibilityInstance, den kan kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>egenskapen det refereres til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke hente eller angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>-egenskapen, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samlingen er installert med den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Forces the creation of the visible control, including the creation of the handle and any visible child controls.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger oppretting av synlige kontrollen, inkludert oppretting av håndtaket og alle synlige underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControl method forces a handle to be created for the control and its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControl Tvinger et håndtak til opprettes for kontrollen og de underordnede-kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: This method is used when you need a handle immediately for manipulation of the control or its children; simply calling a control's constructor does not create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes når du trenger et håndtak umiddelbart manipulering av kontrollen eller underordnede elementer; bare kall til en kontroll konstruktør opprette ikke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: CreateControl does not create a control handle if the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: CreateControl ikke opprette en kontroll-referanse hvis kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can either call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> method or access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> property to create the control's handle regardless of the control's visibility, but in this case, no window handles are created for the control's children.
trans-unit.target: Du kan enten kall den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>metoden eller tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>til å opprette kontrollens håndtere uavhengig kontrollens synlighet, men da ingen vinduet håndtak er opprettet for kontrollens underordnede.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av kontrollsamling for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>tilordnet kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has been created.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The Created property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> was successfully created even though the control's handle might not have been created or recreated yet.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer opprettet `true` hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>ble opprettet selv om kontrollens referanse ikke kan har blitt opprettet eller gjenopprettet ennå.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has been created; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er opprettet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that you retrieve through the CreateGraphics method should not normally be retained after the current Windows message has been processed, because anything painted with that object will be erased with the next WM_PAINT message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt som du hente via metoden CreateGraphics bør ikke vanligvis beholdes når gjeldende Windows-melding er blitt behandlet, fordi noe malt med det objektet blir slettet med neste WM_PAINT melding.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Therefore you cannot cache the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for reuse, except to use non-visual methods like <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan derfor bufre <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt for gjenbruk, bortsett fra å bruke ikke-visuelle metoder som <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must call CreateGraphics every time that you want to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, and then call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using it.
trans-unit.target: Du må i stedet kalle CreateGraphics hver gang du vil bruke <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet, og kall deretter <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>Når du er ferdig med å bruke det.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Windows messages, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om Windows-meldinger, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: By design, CreateGraphics sets ownership to the calling thread, and fails if it is called on other threads.
trans-unit.target: Som standard CreateGraphics angir eierskapet til kall tråden og mislykkes hvis den kalles på andre tråder.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and CreateGraphics if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I tillegg til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>egenskapen fire metoder på en kontroll som gir sikre tråder: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, og CreateGraphics Hvis håndtaket for kontrollen som allerede er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling CreateGraphics before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: Kaller CreateGraphics før kontrollens referanse er opprettet på en bakgrunnstråd, kan det føre til ugyldig på tvers av tråd kall.

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre metodekall, bør du bruke én av metodene invoke for å formidle kallet til kontrollens tråd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et håndtak for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You typically should not call the CreateHandle method directly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vanligvis ikke kalle metoden CreateHandle direkte.

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl%2A> method, which forces a handle to be created for the control and its child controls when the control is created.
trans-unit.target: Den foretrukne metoden er å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl%2A>metoden som tvinger et håndtak til opprettes for kontrollen og de underordnede kontrollene når kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object is in a disposed state.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er i en tilstand som er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppretting av nødvendige parameterne når kontrollen referansen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: The CreateParams property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CreateParams må ikke overstyres og brukes til å justere egenskaper for avledede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>må angis av de tilsvarende egenskapene i kontrollen for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>kan bare utvides når du wrapping en standard Windows Kontrollklasse eller angi stiler ikke leveres av Windows Forms-navneområdet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the [CREATESTRUCT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632603.aspx)structure documentation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter kontrollparametere, se den `CreateWindow` og `CreateWindowEx` funksjoner og [CREATESTRUCT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632603.aspx)struktur dokumentasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> som inneholder de nødvendige oppretting parameterne når håndtaket for kontrollen som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor that is displayed when the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir markør som vises når musepekeren holdes over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Assign a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor> to the Cursor property of the control to change the cursor displayed when the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: Tilordne en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>til egenskapen markøren for kontrollen for å endre markøren vises når musepekeren holdes over kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: To temporarily change the mouse cursor for all controls on your application set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Endre midlertidig pekeren for alle kontroller i settet med programmet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically you would set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to a wait cursor when populating a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> or saving or loading a file.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis du vil angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen til en Vent markør ved utfylling en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>lagring eller innlasting av en fil.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Cursor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen markøren er en omkringliggende egenskap.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: En omkringliggende egenskapen er en kontrollegenskap som, hvis ikke angitt, er hentet fra den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>har samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>som sitt overordnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om omsluttende egenskaper i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>klassen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> som representerer markøren skal vises når musepekeren holdes over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data bindings for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter databindingene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataBindings property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk databindinger-egenskapen for å få tilgang til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>

trans-unit.source: By adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to the collection, you can bind any property of a control to the property of an object.
trans-unit.target: Ved å legge til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>objekter i samlingen, kan du binde en egenskap for en kontroll til egenskapen for et objekt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> objekter for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standard bakgrunnsfarge for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property value of a generic top-level control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standardverdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>egenskapsverdi for en generisk på øverste nivå kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can have different defaults.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser kan ha forskjellige standarder.

trans-unit.source: The default background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standardbakgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cursor for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standard markøren for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Override DefaultCursor to configure a default cursor for your control.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre DefaultCursor for å konfigurere en standard klientmarkør for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient than setting the cursor in the control's constructor, and gives automatic support for certain cursor-related designer functions.
trans-unit.target: Dette er mer effektivt enn innstillingen markøren i kontrollens konstruktøren, og gir støtte for automatisk for bestemte markøren-relaterte designer funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> representing the current default cursor.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> som representerer gjeldende standardmarkør.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default font of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standard skrifttypen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the value returned by DefaultFont depending on the operating system and local culture.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver verdien som returneres av DefaultFont avhengig av operativsystemet og lokale kultur.

trans-unit.source: |System/and or Culture|Font| |----------------------------|----------| |Windows NT 4x, Japanese version|MS UI Gothic, 9 point.| |Arabic Windows|Tahoma, 8 point.| |Other operating system/culture|MS Shell Dlg logical font, typically Microsoft San Serif 8 point.| MS Shell Dlg maps to a font set in the system registry.
trans-unit.target: | Systemet / og kulturen | Skrift | |----------------------------|----------| | Windows NT 4 x japansk versjon | MS Brukergrensesnittet Gothic, 9 punkt. | | Arabisk Windows | Tahoma, 8 punkt. | | Andre operativsystemet/kultur | MS grensesnittet Dlg logiske skrift, vanligvis Microsoft San Serif 8 punkt. | MS grensesnittet Dlg tilordnes til en skrift som er angitt i registeret.

trans-unit.source: If the previous fonts are not installed, the default font is Tahoma, 8 point.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de forrige skriftene ikke er installert, er standardskrift Tahoma, 8 punkt.

trans-unit.source: If Tahoma, 8 point, is not installed, DefaultFontreturns the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.GenericSansSerif%2A> property
trans-unit.target: Hvis Tahoma, 8 peker, ikke er installert, DefaultFontreturns verdien for <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.GenericSansSerif%2A>egenskapen</xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.GenericSansSerif%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The value returned will vary depending on the user's operating system the local culture setting of their system.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres avhenger av brukerens operativsystemet innstillingen lokale kulturen av systemet.

trans-unit.source: The default font or the regional alternative fonts are not installed on the client computer.
trans-unit.target: Standardskrift eller regionale alternative skrifter er ikke installert på klientdatamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter forgrunnen standardfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property value of a nonparented control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standardverdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>egenskapsverdi for en nonparented kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can have different defaults.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser kan ha forskjellige standarder.

trans-unit.source: The default foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard forgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardmodus Input metoden redigeringsprogrammet (IME) støttes av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An Input Method Editor (IME) is a program that enables users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, by using a standard keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Inndata (IME) er et program som gjør det mulig for brukere må oppgi komplekse tegn og symboler, for eksempel japansk Kanji-tegn, ved hjelp av et vanlig tastatur.

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class, this property always returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Som implementert i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klasse egenskapen returnerer alltid den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value specifies that the IME mode is inherited from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>verdien angir at IME-modus er arvet fra den overordnede kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter plassen, i piksler, som er angitt som standard mellom kontroller.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> som representerer standard avstanden mellom kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length and height, in pixels, that is specified as the default maximum size of a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter lengden og høyde i piksler, som er angitt som standard maksimumsstørrelsen for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> representing the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> som representerer størrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length and height, in pixels, that is specified as the default minimum size of a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter lengden og høyde i piksler, som er angitt som standard minimumsstørrelsen til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer størrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den interne mellomrommet på innholdet i en kontroll i piksler.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> som representerer det interne mellomrommet over innholdet i en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultSize property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the control when it is initially created.
trans-unit.target: DefaultSize egenskapen representerer den <xref:System.Drawing.Size>kontrollens når den opprettes i utgangspunktet.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the size of the control by setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan justere størrelsen på kontrollen ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du vil beholde bedre ytelse, ikke angi den <xref:System.Drawing.Size>til en kontroll i sin konstruktør.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the DefaultSize property.
trans-unit.target: Den foretrukne metoden er å overstyre DefaultSize-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > På Windows Server 2003 systemer, størrelsen på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>er begrenset av maksimalt pikselbredden bredden og høyden på skjermen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified message to the default window procedure.
trans-unit.target: Sender meldingen angitt til standard vinduet prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av Windows-meldinger i den [WindowProc funksjonen](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565).

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> prosessen.

trans-unit.source: Destroys the handle associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Ødelegger håndtaket tilknyttet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter rektanglet som representerer visningsområdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayRectangle property returns the client rectangle of the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DisplayRectangle returnerer klienten rektanglet på skjermen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For the base control class, this is equal to the client rectangle.
trans-unit.target: For klassen base kontrollen tilsvarer rektangelet klienten.

trans-unit.source: However, inheriting controls might want to change this if their client area differs from their display area.
trans-unit.target: Arving kontroller kan likevel å endre denne hvis sitt klient-område er forskjellig fra området for visning.

trans-unit.source: The display rectangle is the smallest <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> that encloses a control and is used to lay out controls.
trans-unit.target: Vis rektanglet er den minste <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>som omslutter en kontroll og brukes til å sette opp kontroller.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer visningsområdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> og underordnet kontrollerer frigir eventuelt administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.`Dispose()`
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.`Dispose()` </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing`parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing`parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> class is in the process of disposing.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om grunntallet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> klassen er i ferd med å vinningsberegninger.

trans-unit.source: When this property returns `true`, the base<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class is in the process of disposing.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen returnerer `true`, grunntallet<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> klassen er i ferd med å vinningsberegninger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: After the control is disposed of, it can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control.
trans-unit.target: Når kontrollen er fjernet av, kan den ikke lenger refereres som en gyldig Windows-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Selv om forekomsten av en kontroll selges, beholdes den fortsatt i minnet før den fjernes fra minne via datasanering.

trans-unit.source: When a control is disposed of, you cannot call its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når en kontroll selges, du kan ikke kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> class is in the process of disposing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis grunntallet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> klassen er i ferd med å vinningsberegninger; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjer som kontrollen er forankret til den overordnede kontrollen og angir hvordan en kontroll endres med sin overordnede.

trans-unit.source: Use the Dock property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen forankringen til definerer hvordan en kontroll endrer størrelse automatisk når den overordnede kontrollen endrer størrelse.

trans-unit.source: For example, setting Dock to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName> causes the control to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Hvis for eksempel forankringen til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>fører til at kontrollen skal justeres seg selv med venstre kant av den overordnede kontrollen og endre størrelse på når den overordnede kontrollen endrer størrelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: Kontroller er forankret i Z-rekkefølgen, som er visual lagvis i et skjema langs skjemaet z (dybde).

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll kan være forankret til én kanten av beholderen overordnet eller kan være forankret til alle kantene og fyller den overordnede beholderen.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> property on a docked control has no effect on the distance of the control from the the edges of its container.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>egenskap i en forankret kontroll har ingen innvirkning på avstanden for kontrollen fra den kantene i beholderen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> and Dock properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>og forankringen egenskaper utelukker hverandre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Bare én kan angis samtidig, og den siste som er satt prioriteres.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Begins a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Starter dra og slipp.

trans-unit.source: The `allowedEffects` parameter determines which drag operations can occur.
trans-unit.target: Den `allowedEffects` parameteren bestemmer hvilken dra operasjoner kan oppstå.

trans-unit.source: If the drag operation needs to interoperate with applications in another process, data should either be a base managed class (<xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>), or an object that implements <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dra-operasjonen krever sammen med applikasjoner i en annen prosess, data skal være en administrert basisklasse (<xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, eller <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>), eller et objekt som implementerer <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen nedenfor beskriver hvordan og når hendelser som er knyttet til dra og slipp operasjoner registreres.

trans-unit.source: The DoDragDrop method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: Metoden DoDragDrop bestemmer kontrollen under gjeldende markørplassering.

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Den deretter kontrollerer om kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med dra og slipp effekt som er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over dra og slipp effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i posisjon for musen markøren, tastatur tilstand og mus knappetilstand spores.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis brukeren flytter utenfor et vindu i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flyttes til en annen kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>for denne kontrollen aktiveres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flytter, men fortsatt være i samme kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en endring i knappen tastaturet eller musen tilstand, til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>denne hendelsen oppstår og bestemmer om du vil fortsette dra, hvis du vil slette dataene, eller å avbryte operasjonen basert på verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>egenskapen for hendelsens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Continue`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>hendelsen skjer hvis du vil fortsette operasjonen og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med det nye resultat slik at riktige visuelle tilbakemeldinger kan angis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over gyldige Slett effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>hendelser er paret slik at som musen flytter på tvers av drop målet, brukeren får mest oppdaterte tilbakemeldingen på posisjon av musen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Drop`Slett effekt verdien, returneres til datakilden, slik at kildeprogrammet kan utføre riktig operasjon i kildedataene; for eksempel klippe ut dataene hvis operasjonen var en flytting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Cancel`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DoDragDrop method catches all exceptions and rethrows only the following security or critical exceptions: - SecurityException - NullReferenceException - StackOverflowException - OutOfMemoryException - ThreadAbortException - ExecutionEngineException - IndexOutOfRangeException - AccessViolationException
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For DoDragDrop metoden fanger inn alle unntak og rethrows bare følgende sikkerheten eller kritiske unntak: - SecurityException - NullReferenceException - StackOverflowException - OutOfMemoryException - ThreadAbortException - ExecutionEngineException - IndexOutOfRangeException - AccessViolationException

trans-unit.source: The data to drag.
trans-unit.target: Dataene for å dra.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: A value from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"></xref> enumeration that represents the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: En verdi fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"> </xref> opplisting som representerer den endelige effekten som ble utført under dra og slipp.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal tegne overflaten ved hjelp av en sekundær buffer til å redusere eller forby flimmer.

trans-unit.source: Buffered graphics can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by progressive redrawing of parts of a displayed surface.
trans-unit.target: Bufret grafikk kan redusere eller fjerne flimmer skyldes progressiv oppdatering av deler av en vises overflate.

trans-unit.source: Buffered graphics require that the updated graphics data is first written to a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Bufret grafikk krever at skrives først oppdatert dataene til en buffer.

trans-unit.source: The data in the graphics buffer is then quickly written to displayed surface memory.
trans-unit.target: Dataene i bufferen grafikk skrives deretter raskt til vises surface minne.

trans-unit.source: The relatively quick switch of the displayed graphics memory typically reduces the flicker that can otherwise occur.
trans-unit.target: Bryteren relativt rask vises grafikk minne reduserer vanligvis flimmer som kan oppstå hvis.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > DoubleBuffered is not a bindable property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > DoubleBuffered er ikke en egenskap som kan bindes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the surface of the control should be drawn using double buffering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis overflaten i kontrollen skal tegnes med doble bufring; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når du dobbeltklikker kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Dobbeltklikk bestemmes av innstillinger for mus av brukerens operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan angi tiden mellom Klikk museklikk som Dobbeltklikk i stedet for to Klikk.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event is raised every time a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>denne hendelsen oppstår hver gang en kontroll er dobbeltklikker.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> and DoubleClick events of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> and DoubleClick events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis for eksempel, du har hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>og DoubleClick hendelser i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>og DoubleClick hendelser registreres når skjemaet er dobbeltklikker og begge metodene kalles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the DoubleClick event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en kontroll er dobbeltklikker og kontrollen støtter ikke hendelsen DoubleClick den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>hendelse kan oppstå to ganger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: You must set the `StandardDoubleClick` and `StandardClick` values of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to `true` for this event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi den `StandardDoubleClick` og `StandardClick` verdier av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>til `true` for denne-hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: These values might already be set to `true` if you are inheriting from existing Windows Forms controls.
trans-unit.target: Disse verdiene kan allerede være satt til `true` Hvis du arver fra en eksisterende Windows Forms kontrollerer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, DoubleClick, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Følgende hendelser, ikke aktiveres den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>klasse med mindre det er minst én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>DoubleClick, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes minst én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>i samlingen, og brukeren samhandler med egenskapen overskriften (der den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>navnene vises), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>opphøyer riktig hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis brukeren samhandling er innenfor klientområdet i kategorisiden den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>opphøyer riktig hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en dra og slipp er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
