trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>i skjermkoordinater, ikke klienten koordinater.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] code converts the properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: Følgende linje med [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] kode konverterer egenskapene til en klient <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE] > In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> and DragDrop events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised.
trans-unit.target: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE]> I versjoner eldre enn [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], hvis du legger til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>og dra og slipp hendelser i en Windows-skjema og dra og slipp noe på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>under utformingen av `DropDrop` og `DropEnter` hendelser registreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: However, when you close and reopen the solution, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> and DragDrop events are not raised again.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid når du lukker og åpner løsning av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>og dra og slipp hendelser ikke aktiveres på nytt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et objekt drar til kontrollens område.

trans-unit.source: The DragEnter event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: DragEnter-hendelsen oppstår når brukeren drar først pekeren over kontrollen under dra og slipp.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> with DragEnter and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I versjoner eldre enn [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], hvis du legger til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>med DragEnter og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>i et Windows-skjema og dra og slipp noe på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>under utformingen av `DropDrop` og `DropEnter` hendelser registreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: However, when you close and reopen the solution, the DragEnter and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> events are not raised again.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid når du lukker og åpner løsning av DragEnter og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>hendelser ikke aktiveres på nytt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen nedenfor beskriver hvordan og når hendelser som er knyttet til dra og slipp operasjoner registreres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>metoden bestemmer kontrollen under gjeldende markørplassering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Den deretter kontrollerer om kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med dra og slipp effekt som er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over dra og slipp effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i posisjon for musen markøren, tastatur tilstand og mus knappetilstand spores.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis brukeren flytter utenfor et vindu i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the DragEnter for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flyttes til en annen kontroll, oppstår DragEnter for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flytter, men fortsatt være i samme kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en endring i knappen tastaturet eller musen tilstand, til<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> denne hendelsen oppstår og bestemmer om du vil fortsette dra, hvis du vil slette dataene, eller å avbryte operasjonen basert på verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>egenskapen for hendelsens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Continue`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>hendelsen skjer hvis du vil fortsette operasjonen og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med det nye resultat slik at riktige visuelle tilbakemeldinger kan angis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over gyldige Slett effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>hendelser er paret slik at som musen flytter på tvers av drop målet, brukeren får mest oppdaterte tilbakemeldingen på posisjon av musen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Drop`Slett effekt verdien, returneres til datakilden, slik at kildeprogrammet kan utføre riktig operasjon i kildedataene; for eksempel klippe ut dataene hvis operasjonen var en flytting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Cancel`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>i skjermkoordinater, ikke klienten koordinater.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] code converts the properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: Følgende linje med [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] kode konverterer egenskapene til en klient <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ```Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et objekt drar utenfor gyldig område for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DragLeave event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: DragLeave-hendelsen oppstår når brukeren drar markøren utenfor kontrollen eller brukeren avbryter gjeldende dra og slipp-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen nedenfor beskriver hvordan og når hendelser som er knyttet til dra og slipp operasjoner registreres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>metoden bestemmer kontrollen under gjeldende markørplassering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Den deretter kontrollerer om kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med dra og slipp effekt som er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over dra og slipp effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i posisjon for musen markøren, tastatur tilstand og mus knappetilstand spores.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the DragLeave event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis brukeren flytter utenfor et vindu, oppstår DragLeave-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flyttes til en annen kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>for denne kontrollen aktiveres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flytter, men fortsatt være i samme kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en endring i knappen tastaturet eller musen tilstand, til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>denne hendelsen oppstår og bestemmer om du vil fortsette dra, hvis du vil slette dataene, eller å avbryte operasjonen basert på verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>egenskapen for hendelsens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Continue`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>hendelsen skjer hvis du vil fortsette operasjonen og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med det nye resultat slik at riktige visuelle tilbakemeldinger kan angis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over gyldige Slett effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>hendelser er paret slik at som musen flytter på tvers av drop målet, brukeren får mest oppdaterte tilbakemeldingen på posisjon av musen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Drop`Slett effekt verdien, returneres til datakilden, slik at kildeprogrammet kan utføre riktig operasjon i kildedataene; for eksempel klippe ut dataene hvis operasjonen var en flytting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the DragLeave event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Cancel`, DragLeave denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et objekt drar over kontrollens område.

trans-unit.source: The DragOver event is raised when the mouse cursor moves within the bounds of the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: DragOver denne hendelsen oppstår når musepekeren flytter i grensene for kontrollen under dra og slipp.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen nedenfor beskriver hvordan og når hendelser som er knyttet til dra og slipp operasjoner registreres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>metoden bestemmer kontrollen under gjeldende markørplassering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Den deretter kontrollerer om kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med dra og slipp effekt som er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over dra og slipp effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i posisjon for musen markøren, tastatur tilstand og mus knappetilstand spores.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis brukeren flytter utenfor et vindu i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flyttes til en annen kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>for denne kontrollen aktiveres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the DragOver event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flytter, men forblir i denne kontrollen, oppstår DragOver-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en endring i knappen tastaturet eller musen tilstand, til<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> denne hendelsen oppstår og bestemmer om du vil fortsette dra, hvis du vil slette dataene, eller å avbryte operasjonen basert på verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>egenskapen for hendelsens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> value is `Continue`, the DragOver event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>verdien er `Continue`, DragOver denne hendelsen oppstår hvis du vil fortsette operasjonen og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med det nye resultat slik at riktige visuelle tilbakemeldinger kan angis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over gyldige Slett effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DragOver and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For DragOver og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>hendelser er paret slik at som musen flytter på tvers av drop målet, brukeren får mest oppdaterte tilbakemeldingen på posisjon av musen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Drop`Slett effekt verdien, returneres til datakilden, slik at kildeprogrammet kan utføre riktig operasjon i kildedataene; for eksempel klippe ut dataene hvis operasjonen var en flytting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Cancel`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>i skjermkoordinater, ikke klienten koordinater.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code converts the properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>: > > Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Følgende linje med C# kode konverterer egenskapene til en klient <xref:System.Drawing.Point>: >> peke clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient (nye punkt (Tyskland. Tyskland er X. Y)); Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Supports rendering to the specified bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Støtter gjengivelse til den angitte punktgrafikken.

trans-unit.source: The DrawToBitmap method is not supported for ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: DrawToBitmap-metoden støttes ikke for ActiveX-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A> event and provide custom printing logic if required.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>hendelsen, og angi egendefinerte utskrift logic om nødvendig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DrawToBitmap method has the following limitations: - An <xref:System.ArgumentException> might be thrown for large bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: Metoden DrawToBitmap har følgende begrensninger: – en <xref:System.ArgumentException>kan bli utløst for stor punktgrafikk.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable size varies by machine.
trans-unit.target: Den maksimale tillatte størrelsen varierer fra maskinen.

trans-unit.source: - DrawToBitmap does not support the `Ink` controls for the Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 operating system.
trans-unit.target: -DrawToBitmap støtter ikke den `Ink` kontroller for Windows XP tavle-PCen Edition 2005-operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: - DrawToBitmap does not draw a child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -DrawToBitmap ikke tegne underordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: - Controls inside containers are rendered in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: -Kontroller i beholdere gjengis i omvendt rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: - DrawToBitmap is not fully functional for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>; only the border of a bitmap is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -DrawToBitmap er ikke fullstendig funksjonelt for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>; bare kantlinje på punktgrafikk vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The bitmap to be drawn to.
trans-unit.target: Bildet som skal tegnes til.

trans-unit.source: The bounds within which the control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Grensene som kontrollen gjengis.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can respond to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen kan svare på inndata fra brukeren.

trans-unit.source: With the Enabled property, you can enable or disable controls at run time.
trans-unit.target: Med egenskapen aktivert, kan du aktivere eller deaktivere kontroller ved kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can disable controls that do not apply to the current state of the application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel deaktivere kontroller som ikke gjelder for gjeldende status for applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: You can also disable a control to restrict its use.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også deaktivere en kontroll for å begrense bruk.

trans-unit.source: For example, a button can be disabled to prevent the user from clicking it.
trans-unit.target: En knapp kan for eksempel deaktiveres for å hindre at brukeren klikker den.

trans-unit.source: If a control is disabled, it cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en kontroll er deaktivert, kan ikke velges.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Setting the Enabled property to `false` does not disable the application's control box or prevent the application window from receiving the focus.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Sette egenskapen Enabled til `false` ikke deaktivere programmets kontroll for eller forhindre at vinduet mottar fokus.

trans-unit.source: When a container control has its enabled property set to `false`, all its contained controls are disabled, as well.
trans-unit.target: Når en beholder har aktivert egenskapen satt til `false`, alle inneholder kontroller er deaktivert, samt.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user clicks on any of the controls contained in a disabled <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control, no events are raised.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis brukeren klikker på alle kontrollene i en deaktivert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>kontroll, ingen hendelser aktiveres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a scrollable control is disabled, the scroll bars are also disabled.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når en rullbare kontroll er deaktivert, deaktiveres også side-felt.

trans-unit.source: For example, a disabled multiline textbox is unable to scroll to display all the lines of text.
trans-unit.target: En deaktivert flere linjer tekstboksen er for eksempel kan ikke rulle for å vise alle linjer med tekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can respond to user interaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen kan svare på inndata fra brukeren; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>egenskapsverdien er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the return value of the asynchronous operation represented by the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> passed.
trans-unit.target: Henter returverdien for den asynkrone operasjonen som representeres av den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>sendt.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If the asynchronous operation has not been completed, this function will block until the result is available.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den asynkrone operasjonen ikke er fullført, blokkerer denne funksjonen er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, EndInvoke, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I tillegg til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>egenskapen fire metoder på en kontroll som gir sikre tråder: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, EndInvoke, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>Hvis referansen for kontrollen som allerede er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>før kontrollens referanse er opprettet på en bakgrunnstråd kan føre til ugyldig på tvers av tråd anrop.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre metodekall, bør du bruke én av metodene invoke for å formidle kallet til kontrollens tråd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents a specific invoke asynchronous operation, returned when calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>Som representerer en bestemt aktivere asynkron operasjon, returneres når du kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> generated by the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>generert av den asynkrone operasjonen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult parameter value is .
trans-unit.target: The asyncResult parameter value is .

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult object was not created by a preceding call of the method from the same control.
trans-unit.target: Den asyncResult objektet ble ikke opprettet av en foregående kallet til den metoden fra denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen angis.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the form that the control is on.
trans-unit.target: Henter skjemaet kontrollen er på.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property value might not be the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> returned by FindForm method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>egenskapsverdien kan ikke være den samme som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>returnert av metoden FindForm.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> is on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>kontroll befinner seg i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>kontroll, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>er på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that the control is on.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> kontrollen er på.

trans-unit.source: Sets input focus to the control.
trans-unit.target: Sett inn fokus til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Focus method returns `true` if the control successfully received input focus.
trans-unit.target: Metoden fokus returnerer `true` Hvis kontrollen ble mottatt inndata fokus.

trans-unit.source: The control can have the input focus while not displaying any visual cues of having the focus.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen kan ha inndata fokus under ikke vises noen visuelle indikatorer for å få fokus.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is primarily observed by the nonselectable controls listed below, or any controls derived from them.
trans-unit.target: Dette overholdes hovedsakelig av kan ikke velges kontrollene som er oppført nedenfor, eller kontroller utledet fra dem.

trans-unit.source: A control can be selected and receive input focus if all the following are true: the `Selectable` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll kan velges, og få inndata fokus hvis følgende betingelser er oppfylt: den `Selectable` verdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>er satt til `true`, den finnes i en annen kontroll, og alle overordnede kontroller er både synlige og aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms-kontroller i følgende liste er ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from these controls are also not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller avledet fra disse kontrollene er heller ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control) > [!NOTE] > Focus is a low-level method intended primarily for custom control authors.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(når det er ingen kobling finnes i kontrollen) > [!NOTE] > fokus er en lavt nivå primært beregnet på egendefinert kontroll forfattere.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Instead, application programmers should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property for child controls, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> method for forms.
trans-unit.target: I stedet programmet programmerere skal bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>metoden eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>-egenskapen for underordnede kontroller eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A>metode for skjemaer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input focus request was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis inndata fokus forespørselen var vellykket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen er inndata fokus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen har fokus. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriften for tekst som vises av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Font property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen skriftstørrelsen er en omkringliggende egenskap.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: En omkringliggende egenskapen er en kontrollegenskap som, hvis ikke angitt, er hentet fra den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>har samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>som sitt overordnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om omsluttende egenskaper i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>klassen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the Font property a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Drawing.Font>er uforanderlig (det vil si at du ikke kan justere egenskapene), kan du bare tilordne egenskapen skrift en ny <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid basere den nye skriften på eksisterende skriften.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```c# myControl.Font = new Font(myControl.Font, myControl.Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb# MyControl.Font = New Font(MyControl.Font, _ MyControl.Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic C#] Følgende er et eksempel på hvordan å justere eksisterende skriften for å gjøre den fet:```c# myControl.Font = new Font(myControl.Font, myControl.Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb# MyControl.Font = New Font(MyControl.Font, _ MyControl.Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ```

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> å bruke teksten vises av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard er verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>egenskapen endres ved en programmatisk endring eller gjennom samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the font of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden på skrifttypen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> på kontrollen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forgrunnsfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ForeColor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ForeColor er en omkringliggende egenskap.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: En omkringliggende egenskapen er en kontrollegenskap som, hvis ikke angitt, er hentet fra den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>har samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>som sitt overordnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om omsluttende egenskaper i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>klassen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Forgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard er verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>egenskapen endres ved en programmatisk endring eller gjennom samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the control that contains the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontrollen som inneholder den angitte referansen.

trans-unit.source: This method searches up the window handle parent chain until it finds a handle that is associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden søker opp vinduet referansen overordnede kjeden til det finner et håndtak som er knyttet til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This method is more reliable than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromHandle%2A> method, because it correctly returns controls that own more than one handle.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er tryggere enn den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromHandle%2A>metoden, fordi den riktig returnerer kontroller som eier mer enn én referanse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The window handle (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) to search for.
trans-unit.target: Vinduet-håndtaket (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the control associated with the specified handle; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no control with the specified handle is found.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som representerer kontrollen som er knyttet til den angitte referansen, og <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det finnes ingen kontroll med den angitte referansen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the control that is currently associated with the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer kontrollen som er knyttet til den angitte referansen.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromChildHandle%2A> method if you need to return controls that own more than one handle.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromChildHandle%2A>metoden hvis du trenger å returnere kontroller som eier mer enn én referanse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromChildHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The window handle (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) to search for.
trans-unit.target: Vinduet-håndtaket (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the control associated with the specified handle; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no control with the specified handle is found.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som representerer kontrollen som er knyttet til den angitte referansen, og <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det finnes ingen kontroll med den angitte referansen.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""></xref> that identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Int32" name="Int32" href=""> </xref> som identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> til å hente.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating how a control will behave when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir hvordan en kontroll vil fungere når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>egenskapen er aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the child control that is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Henter den underordnede kontrollen som er plassert ved angitte koordinater.

trans-unit.source: If there is no child control at the specified point, the GetChildAtPoint method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen underordnede angitt, returnerer metoden GetChildAtPoint `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates where you want to look for a control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som inneholder koordinatene der du vil søke etter en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Coordinates are expressed relative to the upper-left corner of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: Koordinater er angitt i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet for klienten for kontrollens.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the control that is located at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som representerer kontrollen som er plassert i det angitte punktet.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the child control that is located at the specified coordinates, specifying whether to ignore child controls of a certain type.
trans-unit.target: Henter den underordnede kontrollen som er plassert i de angitte koordinatene som angir om å ignorere underordnede kontroller en bestemt type.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates where you want to look for a control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som inneholder koordinatene der du vil søke etter en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Coordinates are expressed relative to the upper-left corner of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: Koordinater er angitt i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet for klienten for kontrollens.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GetChildAtPointSkip"></xref>, determining whether to ignore child controls of a certain type.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GetChildAtPointSkip"> </xref>, bestemme om skal ignoreres underordnede kontroller en bestemt type.

trans-unit.source: The child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Underordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> på de angitte koordinatene.

trans-unit.source: Returns the next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl"></xref> up the control's chain of parent controls.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer neste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl"> </xref> oppover kontrollens kjede med overordnede-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl"></xref>, that represents the parent of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl"> </xref>, som representerer overordnet for det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the next control forward or back in the tab order of child controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter den neste kontrollen frem eller tilbake i kategorirekkefølgen av underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The GetNextControl method is dependent on tab order.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetNextControl er avhengig av kategorien rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: To iterate through all controls of a form, including nested controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gå gjennom alle kontroller av et skjema, inkludert nestede kontroller, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get or set the active control of a container control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente eller angi den aktive kontrollen i en beholderkontroll, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to start the search with.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> skal startes med.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to search backward.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å søke i kategorien rekkefølge. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å søke bakover.

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Neste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> i kategorien rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på et rektangulært område som en kontroll kan tilpasses.

trans-unit.source: The behavior of GetPreferredSize differs by control.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten for GetPreferredSize er forskjellig av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A> might be unable to assign the returned size to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A>kan ikke tildele returnerte størrelsen på kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases.
trans-unit.target: Du kan returnere en størrelse større enn begrensninger som er angitt i den `proposedSize` parameteren, men `proposedSize` må redusere etter begrensningen reduserer.

trans-unit.source: For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` kan ikke være større enn `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`.

trans-unit.source: The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er en `proposedSize` 0 eller `Size.Empty`, som er definert som ubegrenset.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert størrelse området for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: En i par med typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer bredden og høyden på et rektangel.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: Henter grensene som skaleres kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is a helper method that is called by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> to retrieve the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en helper metode kalles av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>til å hente grensene som kontrollen skal skaleres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to reuse the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> scaling logic, but you must supply your own bounds.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre denne metoden for å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>skalering logic, men du må oppgi en grensene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns scaled bounds that take into account the `specified` bounds, whether the control is top level, whether the control is fixed width or auto size, and any adornments the control might have.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering returnerer skalert område som tar hensyn den `specified` område, om kontrollen skal være øverste nivå, om kontrollen er fast bredde eller Autostørrelse og noen utsmykninger kontrollen kan ha.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som angir området som skal hente Vis grensene.

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Høyden og bredden på kontrollens område.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> som angir grensene for kontrollen skal brukes når du definerer størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer grensene som skaleres kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified control style bit for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den angitte kontrollen stil bit for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Control style bit flags are used to categorize supported behavior.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen stil biters flagg brukes til å kategorisere støttes virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method and passing in the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit and the Boolean value to set the bit to.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll kan aktivere en stil ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>metoden og sende i det aktuelle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>BITS og den boolske verdien skal angis for biten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value assigned to a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit, use the GetStyle method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> member to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Å bestemme verdien som er tilordnet til et angitt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bit, bruker du metoden GetStyle og sende i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>medlem skal evalueres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> bit to return the value from.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"> </xref> biters vil returnere verdi fra.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified control style bit is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte kontroll stil biten er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the control is a top-level control.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om kontrollen er en kontroll på øverste nivå.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is a top-level control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er en kontroll på øverste nivå. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer i løpet av en dra-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The GiveFeedback event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: GiveFeedback denne hendelsen oppstår når en dra og slipp er startet.

trans-unit.source: With the GiveFeedback event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for en hendelse for dra kan endre utseendet av musepekeren for å gi visuelle tilbakemeldinger under dra og slipp GiveFeedback-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen nedenfor beskriver hvordan og når hendelser som er knyttet til dra og slipp operasjoner registreres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>metoden bestemmer kontrollen under gjeldende markørplassering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Den deretter kontrollerer om kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the GiveFeedback event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er et gyldig Slett mål, oppstår hendelsen GiveFeedback med dra og slipp effekt som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over dra og slipp effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i posisjon for musen markøren, tastatur tilstand og mus knappetilstand spores.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis brukeren flytter utenfor et vindu i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flyttes til en annen kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>for denne kontrollen aktiveres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flytter, men fortsatt være i samme kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en endring i knappen tastaturet eller musen tilstand, til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>denne hendelsen oppstår og bestemmer om du vil fortsette dra, hvis du vil slette dataene, eller å avbryte operasjonen basert på verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>egenskapen for hendelsens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the GiveFeedback event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Continue`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>hendelsen skjer hvis du vil fortsette operasjonen, og GiveFeedback denne hendelsen oppstår med det nye resultat slik at riktige visuelle tilbakemeldinger kan angis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over gyldige Slett effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and GiveFeedback events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>og GiveFeedback hendelser er paret slik at som musen flytter på tvers av drop målet, brukeren får mest oppdaterte tilbakemeldingen på posisjon av musen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Drop`Slett effekt verdien, returneres til datakilden, slik at kildeprogrammet kan utføre riktig operasjon i kildedataene; for eksempel klippe ut dataene hvis operasjonen var en flytting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Cancel`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen får fokus.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the window handle that the control is bound to.
trans-unit.target: Henter vinduet håndtaket kontrollen er bundet til.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Handle property is a Windows `HWND`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen referansen er en Windows `HWND`.

trans-unit.source: If the handle has not yet been created, referencing this property will force the handle to be created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis håndtaket ikke har blitt opprettet, vil refererer til denne egenskapen tvinge håndtaket for opprettes.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that contains the window handle (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IntPtr>som inneholder vinduet-håndtaket (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) kontrollens.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a handle is created for the control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en referansen er opprettet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A handle is created when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is displayed for the first time.
trans-unit.target: En referanse opprettes når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>vises for første gang.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is created that has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> set to `false`, the HandleCreated event will not be raised until <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>som har <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>satt til `false`, vil ikke starter hendelsen HandleCreated før <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see[Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser[behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's handle is in the process of being destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollens referanse er i ferd med å fjernes.

trans-unit.source: During the HandleDestroyed event, the control is still a valid Windows control and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> can be recreated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen HandleDestroyed kontrollen er fortsatt en gyldig Windows-kontroll og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>kan gjenopprettes ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control contains one or more child controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen inneholder én eller flere underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.Count%2A> greater than zero, the HasChildren property will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>samlingen inneholder en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.Count%2A>større enn null, HasChildren egenskapen returnere `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: Accessing the HasChildren property does not force the creation of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> if the control has no children, so referencing this property can provide a performance benefit when walking a tree of controls.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til egenskapen HasChildren tvinger ikke oppretting av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>Hvis kontrollen har ingen underordnede, så refererer til denne egenskapen kan gi en ytelse fordelen ved flytting tre kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control contains one or more child controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen inneholder én eller flere underordnede kontroller; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the Height and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property value of the control to change.
