trans-unit.target: Endringer i høyden og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>egenskapen verdier årsaken den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>egenskapsverdi for kontrollen for å endre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The minimum height for the derived control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Minimumshøyden for kontrollen som er avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>er én pikselbredden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: The default height for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control is three pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standard-høyde for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>kontrollen er tre piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: Setting the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control to a value less than one will reset the property value to the default height.
trans-unit.target: Angir høyden på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>kontrollere til en verdi mindre enn én tilbakestiller egenskapsverdien standard høyden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: The height of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på kontrollen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user requests help for a control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren ber om hjelp for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The HelpRequested event is commonly raised when the user presses the F1 key or an associated context-sensitive help button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: HelpRequested denne hendelsen oppstår vanligvis når brukeren trykker du F1 eller tilknyttede kontekstavhengig Hjelp-knappen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Conceals the control from the user.
trans-unit.target: Ser kontrollen fra brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Hiding the control is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Skjule kontrollen tilsvarer innstillingen det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Hide method is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property returns a value of `false` until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden Skjul kalles, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>returnerer en verdi for egenskapen `false` før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir inndataene metoden redigeringsprogrammet IME ()-modus for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An IME is a program that enables users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, using a standard keyboard.
trans-unit.target: En IME er et program som gjør det mulig for brukere må oppgi komplekse tegn og symboler, for eksempel japansk Kanji-tegn, med et standard tastatur.

trans-unit.source: The ImeMode property is typically set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that is intended to only enter numeric values.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ImeMode vanligvis er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontrollen som er ment å angi bare numeriske verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ImeMode property value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien ImeMode er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Most classes that do not directly support Input Method Editors, or allow direct input from an IME, will set the value of this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>.
trans-unit.target: De fleste klasser som ikke direkte støtter inndata for inndata, eller Tillat direkte inndata fra en IME vil angi verdien for denne egenskapen til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The user can interactively change the ImeMode unless it has been programmatically set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Brukeren kan endre ImeMode interaktivt med mindre den programmatisk er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the user will not be able to use the IME.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet vil brukeren ikke kunne bruke IME.

trans-unit.source: > > The ImeMode property is ignored on Windows 8 when the global input mode is in effect.
trans-unit.target: >> ImeMode egenskapen ignoreres på Windows 8 når global inndata modus er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see[Switch Text Input Changed from Per-Thread to Per-User](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se[Switch teksten inndataene endret fra Per tråd til brukerspesifikke](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IME mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir IME-modus til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: IME-modus for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A>egenskapen endres ved en programmatisk endring eller gjennom samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that do not support Input Method Managers will never raise this event.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller som ikke støtter inndata metoden ledere vil aldri hever denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Called after the control has been added to another container.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når kontrollen er lagt til en annen beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The InitLayout method is called immediately after adding a control to a container.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitLayout kalles umiddelbart etter at en kontroll er lagt til en beholder.

trans-unit.source: The InitLayout method enables a control to initialize its layout state based on its container.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitLayout gjør det mulig for en kontroll initialisere tilstanden oppsettet basert på beholderen.

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically apply anchoring and docking to the control in the InitLayout method.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel vil vanligvis bruke forankring og forankringen til kontrollen i InitLayout-metoden.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the entire surface of the control and causes the control to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldiggjøres hele overflaten kontrollens og fører til at kontrollen skal være trukket tilbake.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> method after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>metoden tvinger ikke synkron paint; Hvis du vil tvinge gjennom en synkron paint, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A>metoden etter kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden kalles uten parametere, legges hele klientområdet til update-område.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates a specific region of the control and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldiggjøres et bestemt område kontrollens og fører til en paint-melding sendes til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, invalidates the child controls assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også ugyldiggjøres underordnede kontroller er tilordnet til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> method after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en kontroll Vis krever oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de angitte representanten på tråden som eier kontrollens underliggende vindusreferanse.

trans-unit.source: Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages.
trans-unit.target: Representanter er lik funksjonspekerne C eller C++ språk.

trans-unit.source: Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object.
trans-unit.target: Representanter omfatter en referanse til en metode i et representanten-objekt.

trans-unit.source: The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time.
trans-unit.target: Representanten-objektet kan deretter sendes til kode som kaller metoden refereres til, og metoden som skal aktiveres kan være ukjent på kompileringstidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til funksjonspekerne i C eller C++ er representanter objektorientert typen sikker og sikrere.

trans-unit.source: The Invoke method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that has a window handle if the current control's underlying window handle does not exist yet.
trans-unit.target: Aktiver metoden Søk oppover kontrollens overordnede kjede til det finner en kontroll- eller som har et vindushåndtak Hvis gjeldende kontrollens underliggende vindusreferanse ikke finnes ennå.

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, the Invoke method will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du finner ingen passende referanse, Iverksett metoden for å starte et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller.
trans-unit.target: Unntak som oppstod under kallet overføres til oppkalleren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: Invoke, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I tillegg til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>egenskapen fire metoder på en kontroll som gir sikre tråder: aktivere, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>Hvis referansen for kontrollen som allerede er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>før kontrollens referanse er opprettet på en bakgrunnstråd kan føre til ugyldig på tvers av tråd anrop.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre metodekall, bør du bruke én av metodene invoke for å formidle kallet til kontrollens tråd.

trans-unit.source: The delegate can be an instance of <xref:System.EventHandler>, in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain <xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Representanten kan være en forekomst av <xref:System.EventHandler>da parameteren avsenderen inneholder denne kontrollen, og hendelsesparameteren inneholder <xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The delegate can also be an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>, or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list.
trans-unit.target: Representanten kan også skyldes en forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>, eller andre representant som bruker en ugyldig parameterlisten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>

trans-unit.source: A call to an <xref:System.EventHandler> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker> delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate.
trans-unit.target: Et kall til en <xref:System.EventHandler>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>representanten skal raskere enn et kall til en annen type representant.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker> </xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan bli utløst et unntak hvis tråden som skal behandle meldingen er ikke lenger aktiv.

trans-unit.source: A delegate that contains a method to be called in the control's thread context.
trans-unit.target: Representant som inneholder en metode som skal kalles i kontrollens tråd konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres fra representanten som aktiveres, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis representanten har ingen returverdi.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate, on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle, with the specified list of arguments.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de angitte representanten på tråden som eier kontrollens underliggende vindusreferanse, med den angitte listen over argumenter.

trans-unit.source: Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages.
trans-unit.target: Representanter er lik funksjonspekerne C eller C++ språk.

trans-unit.source: Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object.
trans-unit.target: Representanter omfatter en referanse til en metode i et representanten-objekt.

trans-unit.source: The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time.
trans-unit.target: Representanten-objektet kan deretter sendes til kode som kaller metoden refereres til, og metoden som skal aktiveres kan være ukjent på kompileringstidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til funksjonspekerne i C eller C++ er representanter objektorientert typen sikker og sikrere.

trans-unit.source: If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollens referanse ikke finnes ennå, søker denne metoden opp kontrollens overordnede kjede til det finner en kontroll- eller som har et vindushåndtak.

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du finner ingen passende referanse, oppstår det et unntak i denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller.
trans-unit.target: Unntak som oppstod under kallet overføres til oppkalleren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I tillegg til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>egenskapen fire metoder på en kontroll som gir sikre tråder: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>Hvis referansen for kontrollen som allerede er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>før kontrollens referanse er opprettet på en bakgrunnstråd kan føre til ugyldig på tvers av tråd anrop.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre metodekall, bør du bruke én av metodene invoke for å formidle kallet til kontrollens tråd.

trans-unit.source: The delegate can be an instance of <xref:System.EventHandler>, in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain <xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Representanten kan være en forekomst av <xref:System.EventHandler>da parameteren avsenderen inneholder denne kontrollen, og hendelsesparameteren inneholder <xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The delegate can also be an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>, or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list.
trans-unit.target: Representanten kan også skyldes en forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>, eller andre representant som bruker en ugyldig parameterlisten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>

trans-unit.source: A call to an <xref:System.EventHandler> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker> delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate.
trans-unit.target: Et kall til en <xref:System.EventHandler>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>representanten skal raskere enn et kall til en annen type representant.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker> </xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan bli utløst et unntak hvis tråden som skal behandle meldingen er ikke lenger aktiv.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes parameters of the same number and type that are contained in the `args` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Representant til en metode som bruker parametere for samme antall og type som finnes i den `args` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the specified method.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av objekter skal sendes som argumenter til den angitte metoden.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the method takes no arguments.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis metoden tar noen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the return value from the delegate being invoked, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder returverdien fra representanten som aktiveres, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis representanten har ingen returverdi.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the caller must call an invoke method when making method calls to the control because the caller is on a different thread than the one the control was created on.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om Oppkalleren må kalle en invoke-metode gjør metodekall til kontrollen fordi oppkalleren på en annen tråd enn den kontrollen ble opprettet på.

trans-unit.source: Controls in Windows Forms are bound to a specific thread and are not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller i Windows Forms er bundet til en bestemt tråd og er ikke trygt tråd.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you are calling a control's method from a different thread, you must use one of the control's invoke methods to marshal the call to the proper thread.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller en kontrollmetode fra en annen tråd, må du derfor bruke ett av kontrollens aktivere metoder for å formidle kallet til riktig tråden.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to determine if you must call an invoke method, which can be useful if you do not know what thread owns a control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes til å finne ut om du må kalle en invoke-metode, som kan være nyttig hvis du ikke vet hvilken tråd eier en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the InvokeRequired property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe to call: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I tillegg til egenskapen InvokeRequired det finnes fire metoder på en kontroll som tråd trygt å kalle: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>Hvis referansen for kontrollen som allerede er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>før kontrollens referanse er opprettet på en bakgrunnstråd kan føre til ugyldig på tvers av tråd anrop.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of these invoke methods when calling from a different thread.
trans-unit.target: For alle andre metodekall, bør du bruke en av disse starte metoder når du kaller fra en annen tråd.

trans-unit.source: If the control's handle does not yet exist, InvokeRequired searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollens referanse ikke finnes ennå, søker InvokeRequired opp kontrollens overordnede kjede til det finner en kontroll- eller som har et vindushåndtak.

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, the InvokeRequired method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis finner ingen passende referanse, returnerer metoden InvokeRequired `false`.

trans-unit.source: This means that InvokeRequiredcan return `false` if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> is not required (the call occurs on the same thread), or if the control was created on a different thread but the control's handle has not yet been created.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at InvokeRequiredcan returnerer `false` Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>er ikke påkrevd (kallet skjer på samme tråd), eller hvis kontrollen ble opprettet på en annen tråd, men kontrollens referanse ennå ikke er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case where the control's handle has not yet been created, you should not simply call properties, methods, or events on the control.
trans-unit.target: I tilfeller der kontrollens referanse ikke er opprettet, kan du ikke ganske enkelt å kalle egenskaper, metoder eller hendelser kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This might cause the control's handle to be created on the background thread, isolating the control on a thread without a message pump and making the application unstable.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan føre til kontrollens referanse opprettes på bakgrunnstråd isolere kontrollen i en tråd uten en melding pumpe og gjør programmet ustabilt.

trans-unit.source: You can protect against this case by also checking the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A> when InvokeRequired returns `false` on a background thread.
trans-unit.target: Du kan beskytte mot dette tilfellet ved å kontrollere også verdien til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>når InvokeRequired returnerer `false` på en bakgrunnstråd.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control handle has not yet been created, you must wait until it has been created before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollhåndtaket ikke har blitt opprettet, må du vente til den har blitt opprettet før du kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this happens only if a background thread is created in the constructor of the primary form for the application (as in `Application.Run(new MainForm())`, before the form has been shown or `Application.Run` has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer vanligvis hvis en bakgrunnstråd er opprettet i konstruktøren for det primære skjemaet for programmet (som i `Application.Run(new MainForm())`, før skjemaet har vist eller `Application.Run` er blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: One solution is to wait until the form's handle has been created before starting the background thread.
trans-unit.target: En løsning er å vente til skjemaet referansen er opprettet før du starter bakgrunnstråden.

trans-unit.source: Either force handle creation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> property, or wait until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event to start the background process.
trans-unit.target: Enten tvinge referansen oppretting ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>egenskapen eller vente før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>-hendelsen for å starte prosessen bakgrunn.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: An even better solution is to use the `SynchronizationContext` returned by <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> rather than a control for cross-thread marshaling.
trans-unit.target: En enda bedre løsningen er å bruke den `SynchronizationContext` ble returnert av <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>i stedet for en kontroll på tvers av tråder formidling.</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan bli utløst et unntak hvis tråden som skal behandle meldingen er ikke lenger aktiv.

trans-unit.source: For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Use a Background Thread to Search for Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om flere tråder Windows Forms-Kontroller [slik: Bruk et bakgrunnsbilde tråd å søke etter filer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [slik: Kontroller sikker kall til Windows Forms-Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*> was created on a different thread than the calling thread (indicating that you must make calls to the control through an invoke method); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>ble opprettet på en annen tråd enn tråden som utfører kallet (som angir at du må gjøre kall til kontrollen via en invoke-metode); ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is visible to accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen er synlig for tilgjengelighetsprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is visible to accessibility applications; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er synlig for tilgjengelighet applikasjoner. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen er fjernet av.

trans-unit.source: When this property returns `true`, the control is disposed of and can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen returnerer `true`, kontrollen er fjernet av og kan ikke refereres til som en gyldig Windows-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Selv om forekomsten av en kontroll selges, beholdes den fortsatt i minnet før den fjernes fra minne via datasanering.

trans-unit.source: When a control is disposed, you cannot call its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når en kontroll er fjernet, du kan ikke kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has been disposed of; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen har blitt fjernet av; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has a handle associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen har et håndtak som er knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: Use the IsHandleCreated property to determine whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> has been called.
trans-unit.target: Bruk IsHandleCreated-egenskapen til å fastslå om <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>er blitt kalt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a handle has been assigned to the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et håndtak er tilordnet til kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if a character is an input character that the control recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om et tegn er et inndata tegn kontrollen gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: Call the IsInputChar method to determine whether the character specified by the `charCode` parameter is an input character that the control wants.
trans-unit.target: Kall metoden IsInputChar for å finne ut om tegnet angitt av den `charCode` parameteren er det angitte tegnet kontrollen vil.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles under vinduet meldingen forhåndsbehandling for å finne ut om det angitte inndataene tegnet være faktatabell eller sendt direkte til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If IsInputChar returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IsInputChar returnerer `true`, sendes det angitte tegnet direkte til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If IsInputChar returns `false`, the specified character is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IsInputChar returnerer `false`, det angitte tegnet faktatabell og bare sendes til kontrollen hvis det ikke er brukt av forhåndsbehandling fase.

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: Forhåndsbehandling av et tegn, inneholder kontrollerer om den er en mnemonisk for en annen kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som skal testes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character should be sent directly to the control and not preprocessed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tegnet må være sendt direkte til kontrollen ikke faktatabell; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte nøkkelen er en vanlig inndata- eller en bestemt nøkkel som krever forhåndsbehandling.

trans-unit.source: Call the IsInputKey method to determine whether the key specified by the `keyData` parameter is an input key that the control wants.
trans-unit.target: Kall metoden IsInputKey for å finne ut om nøkkelen angitt av den `keyData` parameteren er en inndata nøkkel kontrollen vil.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input key should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles under vinduet meldingen forhåndsbehandling for å finne ut om den angitte inndataene nøkkelen skal faktatabell eller sendt direkte til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If IsInputKey returns `true`, the specified key is sent directly to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IsInputKey returnerer `true`, sendes den angitte nøkkelen direkte til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If IsInputKey returns `false`, the specified key is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IsInputKey returnerer `false`, den angitte nøkkelen faktatabell og bare sendes til kontrollen hvis det ikke er brukt av forhåndsbehandling fase.

trans-unit.source: Keys that are preprocessed include the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW keys.
trans-unit.target: Nøkler som er faktatabell inkludere kategorien, RETURNERES, ESC og pil opp, pil, pil venstre og høyrepil nøklene.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte nøkkelen er en vanlig inndata; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the CAPS LOCK, NUM LOCK, or SCROLL LOCK key is in effect.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om nøkkelen CAPS LOCK, antall LOCK eller SCROLL LOCK er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Use the IsKeyLocked property to determine whether the CAPS LOCK, NUM LOCK, or SCROLL LOCK keys are on, whether individually or in combination.
trans-unit.target: Bruk IsKeyLocked-egenskapen for å fastslå om nøklene CAPS LOCK, antall LOCK eller SCROLL LOCK på om individuelt eller sammen.

trans-unit.source: The CAPS LOCK, NUM LOCK, or SCROLL LOCK member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: CAPS LOCK, antall LOCK eller SCROLL LOCK medlem av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key or keys are in effect; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte nøkkelen eller nøkler er gyldige; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The keyVal parameter refers to a key other than the CAPS LOCK, NUM LOCK, or SCROLL LOCK key.
trans-unit.target: Den keyVal parameteren refererer til en nøkkel enn CAPS LOCK, antall LOCK eller SCROLL LOCK-nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is mirrored.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen er speilet.

trans-unit.source: A mirrored control displays both layout and text from right to left.
trans-unit.target: En speilet kontroll viser både oppsettet og tekst fra høyre mot venstre.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create Mirrored Windows Forms and Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c5c4ecc-9bfb-4508-8383-753e306719b1).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: opprette speilet Windows Forms og kontroller](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c5c4ecc-9bfb-4508-8383-753e306719b1).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is mirrored; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen speilet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified character is the mnemonic character assigned to the control in the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte tegnet etikettens tegnet tilordnet kontrollen i den angitte strengen.

trans-unit.source: The mnemonic character is the character immediately following the first instance of "&" in a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Etikettens tegn er tegnet rett etter den første forekomsten av "&" i <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som skal testes.

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som søk.

trans-unit.source: if the charCode character is the mnemonic character assigned to the control; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis den charCode er etikettens tegnet tilordnet kontrollen; hvis ikke, .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en tast når kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.source: KeyDown 2.
trans-unit.target: KeyDown 2.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in your form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>For å håndtere tastaturhendelser bare på formen-nivå, og ikke aktivere andre kontrolltypene som skal motta tastaturhendelser, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i din skjema <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>hendelseshåndtering metoden `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte nøkler, for eksempel nøkler TAB, RETURNERES, ESC- og behandles av kontroller automatisk.

trans-unit.source: To have these keys raise the KeyDown event, you must override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method in each control on your form.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at disse nøklene heve hendelsen KeyDown, må du overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>metoden i hver kontroll i skjemaet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code for the override of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Koden for overstyring av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>må ha for å finne Hvis en av nøklene spesielle trykkes, og returnerer en verdi av `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> event and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for overstyring av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>metoden, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>hendelsen og sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> event.
trans-unit.target: For kodeeksempel en, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a character.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en bokstav.

trans-unit.source: space or backspace key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: mellomrom eller tilbake tast når kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: KeyPress 3.
trans-unit.target: KeyPress 3.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> The KeyPress event is not raised by non-character keys other than space and backspace; however, the non-character keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>Hendelsen KeyPress oppstår ikke ved ikke tegn nøkler enn plass og tilbake; imidlertid ikke tegn nøklene vise i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>egenskapen utvalg tastetrykk ved kjøretid, og til å bruke eller endre et delsett av vanlige tastetrykk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in your form's KeyPress event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å håndtere tastaturhendelser bare på formen-nivå, og ikke aktivere andre kontrolltypene som skal motta tastaturhendelser, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap i i skjemaet KeyPress hendelseshåndtering metoden `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en nøkkel slippes når kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: KeyUp To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in your form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: KeyUp håndtere tastaturhendelser bare på skjemanivå for å ikke aktivere andre kontroller mottar tastaturhendelser, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i din skjema <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>hendelseshåndtering metoden `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte nøkler, for eksempel nøkler TAB, RETURNERES, ESC- og behandles av kontroller automatisk.

trans-unit.source: To have these keys raise the KeyUp event, you must override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method in each control on your form.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at disse nøklene heve hendelsen KeyUp, må du overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>metoden i hver kontroll i skjemaet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code for the override of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Koden for overstyring av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>må ha for å finne Hvis en av utvalg for trykkes, og returnerer en verdi av `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en kontroll skal replassere de underordnede-kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: The Layout event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppsettet hendelsen oppstår når underordnede kontroller legges til eller fjernes når grensene for kontrollen endres, og når det oppstår andre endringer som kan påvirke oppsettet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen oppsettet undertrykkes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: Avbrytes oppsettet kan du utføre flere handlinger på en kontroll uten å måtte utføre en oppsettet for hver endring.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a Layout event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer størrelse på og flytte en kontroll, ville for eksempel hver operasjon Aktiver en oppsettet-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Henter en bufret kontrollens oppsettet engine-forekomst.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEngine property gets the layout engine for the control's children rather than for the control itself.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LayoutEngine henter motoren oppsettet for kontrollens barna i stedet for selve kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref> for kontrollens innhold.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når inndata fokus forlater kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in pixels, between the left edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden, i piksler mellom venstre kant av kontrollen og venstre kant for klienten for til beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The Left property value is equivalent to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den venstre egenskapsverdien tilsvarer den <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> and Left property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> property value of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>og venstre egenskapen verdier årsaken den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>egenskapsverdi for kontrollen for å endre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the left edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som representerer avstanden i piksler mellom venstre kant av kontrollen og venstre kant av til beholderen klienten diagramområdet.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir koordinatene for øvre venstre hjørne av kontrollen i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Point> class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the upper-left point of the control.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Drawing.Point>klassen er en verditype (`Structure` i [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` i [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), returneres etter verdien, betyr tilgang til egenskapen returnerer en kopi av øverste venstre punktet kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: So, adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point> returned from this property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property values of the control.
trans-unit.target: Dermed innstillingen i <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>eller <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Drawing.Point>returnert fra denne egenskapen påvirker ikke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>egenskapsverdier kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust these properties set each property value individually, or set the Location property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: Til å justere disse egenskapene angi hver egenskapsverdien individuelt, eller angi egenskapen Location med en ny <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the Location property value represents the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>er en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, egenskapsverdien plassering representerer det øverste venstre hjørnet av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>i skjermkoordinater.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som representerer det øvre venstre hjørnet av kontrollen i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location*>egenskapsverdien er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>egenskapen endres ved en programmatisk endring eller gjennom samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen mister fokus.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Controls receive default values for Margin that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller motta standardverdier for marg nærmer innen rimelighetens grenser veiledning for Windows-grensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications.
trans-unit.target: Justeringer fortsatt være nødvendig for bestemte programmer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the Margin property on a docked control has no effect on the distance of the control from the the edges of its container.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sette egenskapen marg på en forankret kontroll har ingen innvirkning på avstanden for kontrollen fra den kantene i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> som representerer avstanden mellom kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's margin changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollens marg endres.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the upper limit that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> can specify.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen som er øverst Begrens som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>kan angi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: En i par med typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer bredden og høyden på et rektangel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the lower limit that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> can specify.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen som er nederst Begrens som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>kan angi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: En i par med typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer bredden og høyden på et rektangel.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which of the modifier keys (SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT) is in a pressed state.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir hvilke av modifikator-nøkler (SKIFT, CTRL og ALT) er i en trykket tilstand.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which of the mouse buttons is in a pressed state.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir hvilke av museknappen er i en trykket tilstand.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen mister innhenting av musen.

trans-unit.source: In rare scenarios, you might need to detect unexpected input.
trans-unit.target: I enkelte tilfeller må du kanskje oppdage uventet inndata.

trans-unit.source: For example, consider the following scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Vurder følgende scenarioer for eksempel.

trans-unit.source: - During a mouse operation, the user opens the Start menu by pressing the Windows key or CTRL+ESC.
trans-unit.target: -Brukeren åpner Start-menyen ved å trykke av Windows eller CTRL + ESC under en musen-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: - During a mouse operation, the user switches to another program by pressing ALT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: -Under en musen operasjon bytter brukeren ved å trykke ALT + TAB til et annet program.

trans-unit.source: - During a mouse operation, another program displays a window or a message box that takes focus away from the current application.
trans-unit.target: -Under en musen operasjon viser et annet program et vindu eller en melding som tar fokuset fra gjeldende program.

trans-unit.source: Mouse operations can include clicking and holding the mouse on a form or a control, or performing a mouse drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Musen operasjonene kan omfatte å klikke og holde musen i et skjema eller en kontroll, eller utfører en mus dra operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: If you have to detect when a form or a control loses mouse capture for these and related unexpected scenarios, you can use the MouseCaptureChanged event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har til å oppdage når et skjema eller en kontroll mister innhenting av musen for disse relaterte uventet scenarier, og du kan bruke MouseCaptureChanged-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen klikkes av musen.

trans-unit.source: Depressing a mouse button when the cursor is over a control typically raises the following series of events from the control: 1.
trans-unit.target: Depressing en museknappen når markøren holdes over en kontroll vanligvis opphøyer følgende rekke hendelser fra kontrollen: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: MouseClick event.
trans-unit.target: MouseClick-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan forekomme kan ikke deaktiveres ulike hendelser i kontrollens klassen.

trans-unit.source: Two single clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second MouseClick event.
trans-unit.target: To enkle klikk som forekommer nær nok tidspunkt, i henhold til musen innstillingene for brukerens operativsystem, genererer en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>hendelsen i stedet for andre MouseClick-hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>hendelser er logisk overordnede hendelser i en kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: De er ofte utløst av andre handlinger, for eksempel å trykke ENTER-tasten når kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen skal doble klikkes av musen.

trans-unit.source: The MouseDoubleClick event occurs when the user depresses a mouse button twice in quick succession when the cursor is over the control.
trans-unit.target: MouseDoubleClick-hendelsen oppstår når brukeren depresses museknappen to ganger i rask rekkefølge når markøren holdes over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The time interval that separates two single clicks from a double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Tidsintervallet som skiller to enkelt klikk fra en Dobbeltklikk bestemmes av innstillinger for mus av brukerens operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The following series of events is raised by the control when such a user action takes place: 1.
trans-unit.target: Følgende rekke hendelser oppstår av kontrollen når slike en handling har inntruffet: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: MouseDoubleClick event.
trans-unit.target: MouseDoubleClick hendelse.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan forekomme kan ikke deaktiveres ulike hendelser i kontrollens klassen.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>hendelser er logisk overordnede hendelser i en kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: They may be raised by other user actions, such as shortcut key combinations.
trans-unit.target: De kan oppstå andre brukerhandlinger, for eksempel snarveien key kombinasjoner.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når musepekeren holdes over kontrollen og en museknappen trykkes.

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Musen hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> / MouseDown / <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>/ MouseDown / <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>4.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> 5.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når musepekeren holdes over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A typical use of MouseHover is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: Det er en vanlig bruk av MouseHover å vise et verktøytips når musen holder på en kontroll i et angitt område kontrollens ("Hold pekeren rektangelet").

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pause kreves for denne-hendelse er angitt i millisekunder som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MouseHover event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen MouseHover definert og registrert i forbindelse med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the mouse cursor in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Henter plasseringen av pekeren i skjermkoordinater.

trans-unit.source: The MousePosition property returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> that represents the mouse cursor position at the time the property was referenced.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer de MousePosition en <xref:System.Drawing.Point>som representerer posisjon for musen markøren da det ble referert til egenskapen.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The coordinates indicate the position on the screen, not relative to the control, and are returned regardless of whether the cursor is positioned over the control.
trans-unit.target: Koordinatene angir posisjonen i skjermbildet ikke i forhold til kontrollen, og returneres uansett om markøren er plassert over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the screen are 0,0.
trans-unit.target: Koordinatene for øvre venstre hjørne av skjermen er 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The MousePosition property is identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MousePosition er identisk med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som inneholder koordinatene til pekeren i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når musepekeren holdes over kontrollen og en museknappen.

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Musen hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>
