trans-unit.source: MouseUp 5.
trans-unit.target: MouseUp 5.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> > [!NOTE] > The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, MouseUp, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>> [!NOTE] > Følgende hendelser, ikke aktiveres den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>klasse med mindre det er minst én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>MouseUp, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes minst én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>i samlingen, og brukeren samhandler med egenskapen overskriften (der den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>navnene vises), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>opphøyer riktig hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis brukeren samhandling er innenfor klientområdet i kategorisiden den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>opphøyer riktig hendelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Name property can be used at run time to evaluate the object by name rather than type and programmatic name.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Name kan brukes på kjøretidspunktet ikke evaluere objektet etter navn i stedet type og programmatisk navn.

trans-unit.source: Because the Name property returns a <xref:System.String> type, it can be evaluated in case-style logic statements (`Select` statement in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `switch` statement in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/add/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: Fordi egenskapen Name returnerer en <xref:System.String>type, den kan evalueres i tilfelle-stil logic setninger (`Select` uttrykket i [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `switch` uttrykket i [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] og [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/add/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]).</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The name of the control.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated"></xref> event with a specified region of the control to invalidate.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the control of Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Varsler kontroll av Windows-meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The OnNotifyMessage method is called if the control's `EnableNotifyMessage` style bit is set in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnNotifyMessage kalles hvis kontrollens `EnableNotifyMessage` stil bit er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The `EnableNotifyMessage` style in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enables the control to be notified when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method receives a Windows message.
trans-unit.target: Den `EnableNotifyMessage` style i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>aktiverer kontrollen skal varsles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>metoden mottar en Windows-melding.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: With this method, semi-trusted controls can listen for Windows messages without enabling them to modify the message.
trans-unit.target: Med denne metoden kan bare klarerte Kontroller lytte for Windows-meldinger uten slik at de kan endre meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that represents the Windows message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> som representerer Windows-melding.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: After dragging has begun, this method is called repeatedly by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] until the drag operation is either canceled or completed.
trans-unit.target: Etter dra har begynt, denne metoden kalles gjentatte ganger ved den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] til dra-operasjonen er avbrutt eller er fullført.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Override this method if you want to change the point at which dragging is canceled or at which a drop occurs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil endre punktet ved som dra er avbrutt eller som en drop forekommer.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnValidating method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnValidating kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnVisibleChanged method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnVisibleChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utfyllingen i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For containers such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the Padding property gets or sets their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For beholdere som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, egenskapen utfylling henter eller angir de respektive <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is equal to its Padding property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er lik egenskapen utfylling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Controls receive default values for Padding that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller motta standard verdier for å fylle som nærmer innen rimelighetens grenser veiledning for Windows-grensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications.
trans-unit.target: Justeringer fortsatt være nødvendig for bestemte programmer.

trans-unit.source: All controls that implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> are enlarged by the amount in Padding when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Alle kontrollene som implementerer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>forstørret med beløpet i fylle når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following controls do not use Padding: - Controls that do not implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> - Custom controls that directly inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>
trans-unit.target: Følgende kontroller bruker ikke utfylling:-Kontroller som ikke implementerer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>via <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>-egendefinerte kontroller direkte arve fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser></xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> som representerer kontrollens interne mellomrommet egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's padding changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen er fylle endringer.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen er trukket tilbake.

trans-unit.source: The Paint event is raised when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Paint-hendelsen oppstår når kontrollen er trukket tilbake.

trans-unit.source: It passes an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> to the method(s) that handles the Paint event.
trans-unit.target: Den sender en forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>til metode(r) som behandler Paint-hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When creating a new custom control or an inherited control with a different visual appearance, you must provide code to render the control by overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en ny egendefinert kontroll eller en arvet kontroll med en annen utseendet, må du angi koden for å gjengi kontrollen ved å overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overriding the OnPaint Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Control Painting and Rendering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [overstyrer metoden OnPaint](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [egendefinert kontroll malingen fullføres og gjengivelse](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parent container of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den overordnede beholderen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Setting the Parent property value to `null` removes the control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of its current parent control.
trans-unit.target: Angi den overordnede egenskapsverdien `null` fjerner kontrollen fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>for den gjeldende overordnede kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the parent or container control of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som representerer overordnet eller beholder kontroll av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger kontrollen til oppsettet logic gjelder alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the PerformLayout method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>metoden ble kalt før PerformLayout-metoden i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>hendelsen undertrykt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created are set to `null` if no values were provided when the PerformLayout method was called.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>opprettet er satt til `null` Hvis ingen verdier ble angitt når metoden PerformLayout ble kalt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger kontrollen til oppsettet logic gjelder alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>metoden ble kalt før du kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>-metoden i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>hendelsen undertrykt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `affectedControl` and `affectedProperty` parameters can both be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den `affectedControl` og `affectedProperty` parametere kan begge settes til `null`.

trans-unit.source: Doing so causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created to be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Gjør dette, vises det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>opprettet for å være satt til `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the most recently changed control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som representerer siste endret kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the most recently changed property on the control.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på egenskapen nylig er endret i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Computes the location of the specified screen point into client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Beregner plasseringen av det angitte skjerm punktet til klienten koordinater.

trans-unit.source: The screen coordinate <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Skjermkoordinaten <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> til å konvertere.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , p, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En som representerer det konverterte , p , i klienten koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Computes the location of the specified client point into screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Beregner plasseringen for det angitte klient punktet til skjermkoordinater.

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Klienten koordinaten <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> til å konvertere.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , p, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En som representerer det konverterte , p i skjermen koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på et rektangulært område kontrollen er plass til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> containing the height and width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som inneholder høyden og bredden i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Preprocesses keyboard or input messages within the message loop before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Preprocesses tastatur eller inndata meldinger i meldingen sløyfen før de fordele.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that represents the message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> som representerer å behandle meldingen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PreProcessControlState"></xref> values, depending on whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*> are <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PreProcessControlState"></xref> values, depending on whether <>*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and whether <>*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*> are <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*>

trans-unit.source: Preprocesses keyboard or input messages within the message loop before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Preprocesses tastatur eller inndata meldinger i meldingen sløyfen før de fordele.

trans-unit.source: PreProcessMessage is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: PreProcessMessage kalles av programmets meldingen sløyfe til Forhåndsbehandle inndata meldinger før de fordele.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier for den `msg` parameteren er WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR og WM_SYSCHAR.

trans-unit.source: When overriding PreProcessMessage, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrer PreProcessMessage, en kontroll skal returnere `true` til å angi at meldingen er behandlet.

trans-unit.source: For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned.
trans-unit.target: For meldinger som ikke er behandlet av kontrollen resultatet av `base.PreProcessMessage` skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> instead of overriding PreProcessMessage.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller vanligvis overstyrer én av metodene mer spesialiserte eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>i stedet for overstyrer PreProcessMessage.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, referert som representerer å behandle meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The possible values are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier er WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR og WM_SYSCHAR.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis meldingen ble behandlet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> -hendelse når en tast mens fokus er på denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses.
trans-unit.target: Noen viktige trykker, for eksempel kategorien, RETURNERES, ESC og piltaster, ignoreres vanligvis av noen kontroller fordi de som inndata key trykker.

trans-unit.source: For example, by default, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control ignores the arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel som standard en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>kontrollen ignorerer piltastene.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: Når du trykker piltastene vanligvis gjør fokus flyttes til den forrige eller neste kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event for a<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Piltastene anses navigasjon nøkler og trykke disse nøklene vanligvis ikke heve <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>hendelse for<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: However, pressing the arrow keys for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> does raise the PreviewKeyDown event.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid å trykke pil nøkler for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>heve hendelsen PreviewKeyDown.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: By handling the PreviewKeyDown event for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> property to `true`, you can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event when the arrow keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Ved behandling av hendelsen PreviewKeyDown for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>og innstilling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>egenskapen `true`, kan du øke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>hendelsen når piltastene trykkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du håndtere piltastene, flyttes imidlertid ikke lenger fokus til forrige eller neste kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en nøkkel for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles under forhåndsbehandling av meldingen til å behandle kommandoen nøkler.

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen nøkler er nøkler som alltid overstyrer vanlige inndata nøkler.

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: Aktiviteter og hurtigmenyer er eksempler på kommandoen nøkler.

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: Metoden må returnere `true` til å angi at den har behandlet nøkkelen for kommandoen eller `false` til å angi at nøkkelen ikke er en nøkkel for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bare kalles når kontrollen ligger i en Windows Forms-program eller som en ActiveX-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The ProcessCmdKey method first determines whether the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, and if so, enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> to process the command key.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ProcessCmdKey først bestemmer om kontrollen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, og hvis dette er tilfellet, kan det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>ikke behandle kommandoen nøkkelen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's ProcessCmdKey method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kommandoen nøkkelen er ikke en hurtigtast og kontrollen har en overordnet, sendes nøkkelen til det overordnede elementets ProcessCmdKey-metoden.

trans-unit.source: The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet er at kommandoen nøkler er "bubbled" kontroll-hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til nøkkelen brukeren valgte viktige data angir også som eventuelt modifikator nøkler trykker på samtidig som nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Modifikator nøkler inkluderer SKIFT, CTRL og ALT nøklene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, referert som representerer vinduet meldingen for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier som representerer nøkkelen til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tegnet ble behandlet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog character.
trans-unit.target: Behandler tegnet dialogboksen.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as control mnemonics.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles under message forhåndsbehandling til å behandle dialogboksen tegn, for eksempel kontrollen mnemoniske.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the character.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bare hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>metoden indikerer at kontrollen ikke behandler tegnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogChar method simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessDialogChar method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ProcessDialogChar ganske enkelt sender tegnet til den overordnede ProcessDialogChar metoden eller returnerer `false` Hvis kontrollen har en overordnet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog characters.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>klasse overstyrer denne metoden hvis du vil utføre selve behandlingen av dialogboksen tegn.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bare kalles når kontrollen ligger i en Windows Forms-program eller som en ActiveX-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som brukes til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tegnet ble behandlet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en dialogboksen nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles under forhåndsbehandling av meldingen til å behandle dialogboksen tegn, for eksempel TAB, RETURNERES, ESC- og nøkler.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bare hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>metoden indikerer at kontrollen ikke behandler nøkkelen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessDialogKey method, or returns `false`if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: ProcessDialogKey ganske enkelt sender tegnet til den overordnede ProcessDialogKey metoden eller returnerer `false`Hvis kontrollen har en overordnet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>klasse overstyrer denne metoden hvis du vil utføre selve behandlingen av dialogboksen nøkler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bare kalles når kontrollen ligger i en Windows Forms-program eller som en ActiveX-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier som representerer nøkkelen til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen ble behandlet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a key message and generates the appropriate control events.
trans-unit.target: En nøkkel melding og genererer de riktige kontrollhendelsene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når en kontroll mottar en tastatur-melding.

trans-unit.source: The method is responsible for generating the appropriate key events for the message by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Metoden er ansvarlig for å generere de aktuelle key hendelsene for meldingen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: Den `m` parameteren inneholder vinduet meldingen som må behandles.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, WM_SYSKEYUP, and WM_IME_CHAR.
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er WM_CHAR WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, WM_SYSKEYUP og WM_IME_CHAR.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, referert som representerer vinduet meldingen for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis meldingen ble behandlet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en tastatur-melding.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når en kontroll mottar en tastatur-melding.

trans-unit.source: The method first determines whether the control has a parent; if so, it calls the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden først bestemmer om kontrollen har en overordnet. Hvis dette er tilfellet, kaller overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method does not process the message then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A> method is called to generate the appropriate keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis overordnet elementets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>metoden ikke behandle meldingen vil <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A>-metoden for å generere hendelsene riktig tastatur.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: Den `m` parameteren inneholder vinduet meldingen som må behandles.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er WM_CHAR WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP og WM_SYSKEYUP.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, referert som representerer vinduet meldingen for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis meldingen ble behandlet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Viser en tastatur-melding.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av en underordnet kontroll når den underordnede kontrollen mottar en tastatur-melding.

trans-unit.source: The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede kontrollen kaller opp denne metoden før genereres tastaturhendelser for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message processed and does not generate any keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden returnerer `true`, den underordnede kontrollen anser meldingen behandles og genererer ikke tastaturhendelser.

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message to preview.
trans-unit.target: Den `m` parameteren inneholder meldingen vinduet til å forhåndsvise.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er WM_CHAR WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP og WM_SYSKEYUP.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessKeyPreview method simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessKeyPreview method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ProcessKeyPreview ganske enkelt sender tegnet til den overordnede ProcessKeyPreview metoden eller returnerer `false` Hvis kontrollen har en overordnet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>klasse overstyrer denne metoden hvis du vil utføre selve behandlingen av dialogboksen nøkler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, referert som representerer vinduet meldingen for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis meldingen ble behandlet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Behandler etikettens tegn.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles for å gi en kontroll muligheten til å behandle et etikettens tegn.

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: Metoden skal fastslå om kontrollen skal være i en tilstand prosessen mnemoniske, og hvis om det angitte tegnet representerer en mnemonisk.

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette er tilfellet, metoden utføre handlingen som er tilknyttet mnemonisk og returnerer `true`.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, metoden skal returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringer av denne metoden brukes ofte den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>metode for å fastslå om det angitte tegnet treff mnemonisk i kontrollens tekst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` This default implementation of the ProcessMnemonic method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` denne standard implementering av metoden ProcessMnemonic returnerer ganske enkelt `false` til å angi kontrollen har ingen mnemonisk.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som brukes til å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tegnet ble behandlet som en mnemonisk av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the product name of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter produktnavnet på samlingen som inneholder kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ProductName property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: ProductName-egenskapen er en skrivebeskyttet egenskap.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of this property, set the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A>egenskapsverdien for <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute>.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute> </xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A> for å endre verdien for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the ProductName property.
trans-unit.target: De følgende kodelinjen C# egenskapen ProductName.

trans-unit.source: ``` [assembly: AssemblyProduct("MyApplication")] ``` > [!NOTE] > It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version.
trans-unit.target: ``` [assembly: AssemblyProduct("MyApplication")] ``` > [!NOTE]> Det anbefales at du oppgir firmanavn, produktnavn og produktversjon.

trans-unit.source: Providing this information enables the use of Windows Forms features such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that make it easier to write applications that comply with the "Certified for Windows" program.
trans-unit.target: Å oppgi denne informasjonen aktiverer bruk av Windows Forms-funksjoner som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>som gjør det enklere å skrive programmer som samsvarer med programmet "Sertifisert for Windows".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Certified for Windows program, see http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om sertifisert for Windows-programmet, kan du se http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.

trans-unit.source: The product name of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Produktnavnet på samlingen som inneholder kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter versjonen av samlingen som inneholder kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ProductVersion property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ProductVersion er en skrivebeskyttet egenskap.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of this property, set the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute.Version%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute.Version%2A>egenskapsverdien for <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute>.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute> </xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute.Version%2A> for å endre verdien for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the ProductVersion property.
trans-unit.target: De følgende kodelinjen C# egenskapen ProductVersion.

trans-unit.source: ``` [assembly: AssemblyVersion("1.0.1")] ``` > [!NOTE] > It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version.
trans-unit.target: ``` [assembly: AssemblyVersion("1.0.1")] ``` > [!NOTE]> Det anbefales at du oppgir firmanavn, produktnavn og produktversjon.

trans-unit.source: Providing this information enables the use of Windows Forms features such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that make it easier to write applications that comply with the "Certified for Windows" program.
trans-unit.target: Å oppgi denne informasjonen aktiverer bruk av Windows Forms-funksjoner som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>som gjør det enklere å skrive programmer som samsvarer med programmet "Sertifisert for Windows".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Certified for Windows program, see http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om sertifisert for Windows-programmet, kan du se http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.

trans-unit.source: The file version of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvilken versjon av samlingen som inneholder kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents a propagating IME mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som representerer en overfører IME-modus.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a propagating IME mode.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer en overfører IME-modus.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> is providing help to accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> leverer hjelp for tilgjengelighetsprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>klassen til brukerne kan ikke starte Hjelp på tilgjengelig objektet ved å trykke F1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> provides you with complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>gir deg fullført informasjonen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer i løpet av dra og slipp og aktiverer drakilden å finne ut om dra og slipp bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: QueryContinueDrag-hendelsen oppstår når det er en endring i tilstanden tastaturet eller musen knappen under dra og slipp.

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen QueryContinueDrag aktiverer drakilden å finne ut om dra og slipp bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen nedenfor beskriver hvordan og når hendelser som er knyttet til dra og slipp operasjoner registreres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>metoden bestemmer kontrollen under gjeldende markørplassering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Den deretter kontrollerer om kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er et gyldig drop-mål i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med dra og slipp effekt som er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over dra og slipp effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i posisjon for musen markøren, tastatur tilstand og mus knappetilstand spores.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis brukeren flytter utenfor et vindu i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flyttes til en annen kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>for denne kontrollen aktiveres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis musen flytter, men fortsatt være i samme kontroll av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, theQueryContinueDrag event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en endring i tilstanden tastaturet eller musen-knappen, theQueryContinueDrag hendelsen oppstår og bestemmer om du vil fortsette dra, vil slette dataene eller avbryte operasjonen basert på verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>egenskapen for hendelsens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Continue`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>hendelsen skjer hvis du vil fortsette operasjonen og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>denne hendelsen oppstår med det nye resultat slik at riktige visuelle tilbakemeldinger kan angis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over gyldige Slett effekter, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>hendelser er paret slik at som musen flytter på tvers av drop målet, brukeren får mest oppdaterte tilbakemeldingen på posisjon av musen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Drop`Slett effekt verdien, returneres til datakilden, slik at kildeprogrammet kan utføre riktig operasjon i kildedataene; for eksempel klippe ut dataene hvis operasjonen var en flytting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>er `Cancel`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: By default, the QueryContinueDrag event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Cancel` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the ESC key was pressed and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Drop` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Som standard hendelsen QueryContinueDrag angir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>til `Cancel` i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>Hvis du ESC trykket og angir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>til `Drop` i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>Hvis venstre midterste eller høyre museknappen trykkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Forces the re-creation of the handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger gjenopprettelsen for håndtaket for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The RecreateHandle method is called whenever parameters are needed for a new control, but using a call from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> is insufficient.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RecreateHandle kalles når parametere som kreves for en ny kontroll, men bruker et kall fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A>til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>er ikke tilstrekkelig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method also calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A> and<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne også metodekall <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A>og<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> og angir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is currently re-creating its handle.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen for øyeblikket opprette håndtaket på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The RecreatingHandle property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method is still running on the control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer RecreatingHandle `true` hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>metoden kjører fortsatt kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is currently re-creating its handle; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er for øyeblikket oppretter håndtaket; på nytt Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Computes the size and location of the specified screen rectangle in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Beregner størrelsen og plasseringen av det angitte skjerm rektangelet i klienten koordinater.

trans-unit.source: The screen coordinate <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Skjermkoordinaten <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> til å konvertere.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , r, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En som representerer det konverterte , r , i klienten koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Computes the size and location of the specified client rectangle in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Beregner størrelsen og plasseringen av angitte klient-rektangel i skjermkoordinater.

trans-unit.target: Klienten koordinaten <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> til å konvertere.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the converted , p, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En som representerer det konverterte , p i skjermen koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Reflects the specified message to the control that is bound to the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: Viser den angitte meldingen til kontrollen som er bundet til den angitte referansen.

trans-unit.source: The ReflectMessage method is an infrastructure method and typically should not be called from your code.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ReflectMessage er en infrastruktur og skal vanligvis ikke kalles fra koden.

trans-unit.source: If the `hWnd` parameter does not represent a valid control, the ReflectMessage method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `hWnd` parameteren ikke representerer en gyldig kontroll, ReflectMessage returneres `false`.

trans-unit.source: Because Windows messages are returned to the top-level window, the ReflectMessage method is used to propagate the return message to the control that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: Fordi Windows-meldinger kommer tilbake til vinduet på øverste nivå, brukes ReflectMessage-metoden til å overføre return meldingen til kontrollen som sendte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> representing the handle of the control to reflect the message to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IntPtr>som representerer håndtaket for kontrollen for å gjenspeile meldingen for å.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> representing the Windows message to reflect.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> som representerer Windows meldingen for å gjenspeile.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was reflected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis meldingen ble reflektert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger kontrollen for å gjøre det klientområdet og tegne umiddelbart selve og alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window region associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det vindu området som er knyttet til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The window region is a collection of pixels within the window where the operating system permits drawing.
trans-unit.target: Vinduet-område er en samling av piksler i vinduet der operativsystemet tillater tegning.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not display any portion of a window that lies outside of the window region.
trans-unit.target: Operativsystemet viser ikke en del av et vindu som ligger utenfor vinduet-område.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of a control's region are relative to the upper-left corner of the control, not the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Koordinatene til en kontroll område er relative til øvre venstre hjørne av kontrollen ikke klientområdet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The collection of pixels contained with the region can be noncontiguous.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Samlingen av piksler med området kan være sammenhengende.

trans-unit.source: The window <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Vinduet <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> tilknyttet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region*>
