trans-unit.source: You typically use this method if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Du vanligvis bruker denne metoden hvis du enten opprette en utformer for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>eller opprette din egen kontrollere implementert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen endres.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> method to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>kontrollens skalert, kan du endre den `sender` parameter for de registrerte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler>metoden en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>og få den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>egenskapen (eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>Egenskaper individuelt).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the Resize event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil behandle egendefinerte oppsett, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>hendelsen i stedet for Resize-hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a Resize event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>denne hendelsen oppstår som svar på en Resize-hendelse, men som svar på andre endringer som påvirker oppsettet for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control redraws itself when resized.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen tegner seg selv når størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The ResizeRedraw property value is equivalent to the return value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method when passing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> value as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien ResizeRedraw tilsvarer returverdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>metoden ved sending av i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>verdien som en parameter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control redraws itself when resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen tegner seg selv når størrelse; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic.
trans-unit.target: Gjenopptar normalt oppsettet logic.

trans-unit.source: Calling the ResumeLayout method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Kaller metoden ResumeLayout tvinger en umiddelbar oppsettet hvis det finnes en ventende oppsettet-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and ResumeLayout methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>og ResumeLayout metoder brukes sammen undertrykke flere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>hendelser mens du justere flere attributter for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the ResumeLayout method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel du vanligvis ville kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>metoden, angir du den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>Egenskaper for kontrollen, og kaller metoden ResumeLayout å aktivere endringene skal tre i kraft.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for ResumeLayout to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Det må være ingen ventende kall til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>for ResumeLayout kalles ble.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic, optionally forcing an immediate layout of pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Gjenopptar normalt oppsettet logic fremtvinger eventuelt en umiddelbar oppsettet for ventende oppsettet forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metoden tvinger en umiddelbar oppsettet hvis det er ventende forespørsler oppsettet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: Når den `performLayout` parameteren er satt til `true`, en umiddelbar oppsettet oppstår hvis det er ventende forespørsler oppsettet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metoder brukes sammen undertrykke flere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>hendelser mens du justere flere attributter for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel du vanligvis ville kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>metoden, angir du den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>Egenskaper for kontrollen, og kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metode for å aktivere endringene skal tre i kraft.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Det må være ingen ventende kall til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>kalles ble.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du legger til flere kontroller til en overordnet kontroll, anbefales det at du ringer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>metoden før du starter kontrollene som skal legges til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Etter at kontrollene er lagt til den overordnede kontrollen, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: Dette øker ytelsen for programmer med mange kontroller.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to execute pending layout requests; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å utføre ventende forespørsler oppsettet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden i piksler mellom høyre kant av kontrollen og venstre kant for klienten for til beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Right property is equal to the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> property value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen høyre er lik summen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>egenskapsverdien og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Right property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen høyre er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: You can change this property value indirectly by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre denne egenskapsverdien indirekte ved å endre verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>Egenskaper og kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som representerer avstanden i piksler mellom høyre kant av kontrollen og venstre kant av til beholderen klienten diagramområdet.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen elementer justeres til støtter nasjonale innstillinger for å bruke høyre-mot-venstre skrifter.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: RightToLeft-egenskapen er en omkringliggende egenskap.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: En omkringliggende egenskapen er en kontrollegenskap som, hvis ikke angitt, er hentet fra den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>har samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>som sitt overordnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om omsluttende egenskaper i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>klassen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RightToLeft er brukt for internasjonale programmer der språket skrives fra høyre mot venstre, for eksempel hebraisk eller arabisk.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>, control elements that include text are displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>, kontrollelementer som inneholder teksten vises fra høyre mot venstre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value of the RightToLeft property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis verdien for egenskapen RightToLeft er endret på kjøretidspunktet, bare raw tekst uten formatering beholdes.

trans-unit.source: The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the RightToLeft property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName> : - Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).
trans-unit.target: Følgende er noen eksempler på hvordan kontrollelementer påvirkes av RightToLeft egenskapsverdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>:-loddrette stolper vises på venstre side i stedet for høyre side av rullbare kontroller (for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, flere linjer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Vannrette side-felt som starter med rullefeltet boksen (er følgende) høyrejustert.

trans-unit.source: - The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: -Merket element Justering kontrolleres av de `CheckAlign` -egenskapen er reversert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: - Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Elementer i listen, kombinasjonsboksen og opp / ned-kontroller er høyrejustert.

trans-unit.source: - Up and down buttons are left-aligned on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> controls.
trans-unit.target: -Opp og ned knapper er venstrejustert på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>

trans-unit.source: - Menus (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) are displayed right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -Menyer (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) vises høyrejustert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: - The alignment of toolbar buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control or the alignment of text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is not affected by the RightToLeft property.
trans-unit.target: -Justering for knappene på verktøylinjen i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>kontroll eller justering av tekst i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>påvirkes ikke av RightToLeft-egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>støtter høyre-mot-venstre justering; innvirkning på en ActiveX-kontroll avhenger imidlertid omfanget som implementert forfatteren av kontrollen støtte for visning fra høyre mot venstre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> to the appropriate <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer angitt <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> til de riktige <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> støtte for høyre-mot-venstre-tekst.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>er satt til `No`, returverdien er lik den `align` parameteren som er sendt inn</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.target: Konverterer angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> til de riktige <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> støtte for høyre-mot-venstre-tekst.

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and all child controls by the specified scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Skaleres kontrollen og alle underordnede kontroller av angitte skaleringsfaktoren.

trans-unit.source: The Scale method scales the control by the specified scaling `factor`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden skalaen skaleres kontrollen av den angitte skalering `factor`.

trans-unit.source: It also recursively scales all child controls if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Det også rekursivt skaleres alle underordnede kontroller hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> to scale each control.
trans-unit.target: Internt denne metodekall <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>til å utvide hver kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> containing the horizontal and vertical scaling factors.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> som inneholder de vannrette og loddrette skalering faktorene.

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Skaleres kontrollen og alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The ratio to use for scaling.
trans-unit.target: Forholdet mellom å bruke for skalering.

trans-unit.source: Scales the entire control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Skaleres hele kontrollen og alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett skaleringsfaktoren.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett skaleringsfaktoren.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines the scaling of child controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som bestemmer skalering av underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: If the ScaleChildren property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A> method will recursively call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> method of each of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ScaleChildren er `true`, og deretter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>metoden vil rekursivt kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>metode for hver av de underordnede-kontrollene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of ScaleChildren always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av ScaleChildren alltid returnerer `true`.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override ScaleChildren to return `false` to indicate that scaling should not be performed on their children.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser kan overstyre ScaleChildren til å returnere `false` til å angi at skalering ikke kan utføres på underordnede.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if child controls will be scaled when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*> method on this control is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis underordnede kontroller skal skaleres med når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>metoden for denne kontrollen er kall; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Skaleres kontrollens plassering, størrelse, utfylling og margin.

trans-unit.source: If the control is top level, this will not scale the control's location.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen øverste nivå, vil dette ikke skalere kontrollens plassering.

trans-unit.source: This does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan ikke skaleres underordnede eller størrelsen på automatisk størrelse kontroller.

trans-unit.source: You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan utelate skalering i en retning ved å endre verdien for den `specified` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: Faktorer som høyden og bredden på kontrollen skal skaleres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdi som angir grensene for kontrollen skal brukes når du definerer størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er relevante for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er relevante for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett skaleringsfaktoren.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett skaleringsfaktoren.

trans-unit.source: Activates the control.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Velg metoden aktiverer kontrollen hvis kontrollens `Selectable` stil bit er satt til `true` i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, den finnes i en annen kontroll, og alle overordnede kontroller er både synlige og aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms-kontroller i følgende liste er ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller avledet fra kontroller i listen også blir ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer en underordnet kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: Angir retningen i kategorirekkefølgen til å velge kontrollen fra.

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: Den `directed` og `forward` parametere som brukes av beholder-stil kontroller.

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: Når den `directed` parameteren er satt til `true`, `forward` parameteren evalueres for å finne ut hvilken kontroll du velger.

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: Når `forward` er satt til `true`, den neste kontrollen i kategorirekkefølgen som er merket; når `false`, forrige kontroll i kategorien rekkefølge er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>metoden aktiverer kontrollen hvis kontrollens `Selectable` stil bit er satt til `true` i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, den finnes i en annen kontroll, og alle overordnede kontroller er både synlige og aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms-kontroller i følgende liste er ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller avledet fra kontroller i listen også blir ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi retningen for kontrollen for å merke; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å flytte fremover i kategorien rekkefølge. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å flytte bakover i kategorien.

trans-unit.source: Activates the next control.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den neste kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectNextControl method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SelectNextControl aktiverer den neste kontrollen i kategorien rekkefølge Hvis kontrollens `Selectable` stil bit er satt til `true` i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, den finnes i en annen kontroll, og alle overordnede kontroller er både synlige og aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms-kontroller i følgende liste er ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller avledet fra kontroller i listen også blir ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control) When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or SelectNextControl methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>(når det er ingen kobling finnes i kontrollen) når du endrer fokus ved hjelp av tastaturet (kategorien SKIFT + TAB og så videre), ved å ringe det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>eller SelectNextControl metoder, eller ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen for det gjeldende skjemaet fokus hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include nested (children of child controls) child controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere nestede (underordnede av underordnede kontroller) kontrollerer underordnede; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to continue searching from the first control in the tab order after the last control has been reached; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sends the control to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Sender kontrollen på baksiden av z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen er flyttet til baksiden av z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er en underordnet av en annen kontroll, flyttes underordnet-kontroll på baksiden av z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er en kontroll på øverste nivå, fungerer denne metoden ikke med mindre kontrollen er aktiv.

trans-unit.source: A top-level control is a control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, that is not a child of another control.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll på øverste nivå er en kontroll som en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, som er ikke en underordnet av en annen kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: An active control is a visible control that has input focus.
trans-unit.target: En ActiveX-kontroll er synlig kontrollen som er inndata fokus.

trans-unit.source: To use the SendToBack method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A> method on the control.
trans-unit.target: For å bruke metoden SendToBack med en inaktiv, på øverste nivå kontroll må først kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>metoden kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating how a control will behave when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Angir en verdi som angir hvordan en kontroll vil fungere når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>egenskapen er aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Sets the bounds of the control to the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Angir grensene for kontrollen til den angitte plasseringen og størrelsen.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the control to the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: Angir de angitte grensene for kontrollen til den angitte plasseringen og størrelsen.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: For any parameter not specified, the current value will be used.
trans-unit.target: For alle parameteren er ikke angitt, brukes den gjeldende verdien.

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: Utfører arbeidet stille de angitte grensene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis parameterne som tilsvarer grensene ikke er inkludert i den `specified` -parameteren sendt med gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, or the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, eller <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>eller <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>egenskapen kan sendes i en referanse til den gjeldende forekomsten av kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Alle verdier som er sendt inn er imidlertid innfridd og brukes til kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The `boundsSpecified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: Den `boundsSpecified` parameteren representerer elementer vises <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>endret av programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `Size` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du endrer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>kontrollens, den `boundsSpecified` parameterverdien er den `Size` verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `None` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>justeres som svar på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>egenskapen, den `boundsSpecified` parameterverdien er den `None` verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > På Windows Server 2003 systemer, størrelsen på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>er begrenset av maksimalt pikselbredden bredden og høyden på skjermen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>
