trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Angir størrelsen på klienten for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The client area starts at the (0, 0) location and extends to the (`x`, `y`) location.
trans-unit.target: Klientområdet starter på den (0, 0) plassering og går til det (`x`, `y`) plassering.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du ikke konfigurere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A>kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The client area width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Klienten området bredden, i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The client area height, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Klienten området høyden, i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Sets a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> flag to either <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir et angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"> </xref> flagget som enten <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Control style bit flags are used to categorize supported behavior.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen stil biters flagg brukes til å kategorisere støttes virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the SetStyle method and passing in the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit (or bits) and the Boolean value to set the bit(s) to.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll kan aktivere en stil ved å kalle metoden SetStyle og sende i det aktuelle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>biters (eller biter) og den boolske verdien skal angis for bit(s).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value assigned to a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> member to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Å bestemme verdien som er tilordnet til et angitt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bit, må du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>medlem skal evalueres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Setting the control style bits can substantially change the behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Innstillingen kontrollen stil biter kan endre betydelig virkemåte for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Review the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enumeration documentation to understand the effects of changing the control style bits before calling the SetStyle method.
trans-unit.target: Se gjennom den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>opplisting dokumentasjonen for å forstå virkningene av å endre kontrollen stil biter før du kaller metoden SetStyle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> bit to set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"> </xref> biters angi.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the specified style to the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>ikke bruke den angitte stilen for kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the control as the top-level control.
trans-unit.target: Angir kontrollen som kontroll på øverste nivå.

trans-unit.source: If you call the SetTopLevel method of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and pass in a value of `false`, the form will not be visible until you call SetTopLevelagain, passing in a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller SetTopLevel-metoden til et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>og sende i en for `false`, skjemaet vises ikke før du kaller SetTopLevelagain i verdien `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the control as the top-level control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi kontrollen som på øverste nivå kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is set to and the control is an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Den value parameteren er satt til og kontrollen er en ActiveX-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The return value is not equal to the value parameter and the property is not .
trans-unit.target: Den <> *> returverdien ikke er lik den value parameteren og <> *> egenskapen er ikke .

trans-unit.source: Sets the control to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: Angir kontrollen til den angitte synlige tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: You would typically override this method to change the visibility behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du vil vanligvis overstyre denne metoden for å endre synligheten virkemåte for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the control visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>foreta kontrollen synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the control to the user.
trans-unit.target: Viser kontrollen for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Showing the control is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Viser kontrollen tilsvarer innstillingen det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Show method is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property returns a value of `true` until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Når Show-metoden kalles, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>returnerer en verdi for egenskapen `true` før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control should display focus rectangles.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal vise fokusrektangler.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this feature, see the[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx),[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx), and the [WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topics.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om denne funksjonen, kan du se den[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx),[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx), og [WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)emner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control should display focus rectangles; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om kontrollen skal vise fokusrektangler; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user interface is in the appropriate state to show or hide keyboard accelerators.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om brukergrensesnittet er i riktig tilstand for å vise eller skjule hurtigtaster.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the keyboard accelerators are visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hurtigtaster er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the site of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir området for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>, hvis noen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height and width of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden og bredden for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Drawing.Size>klassen er en verditype (`Structure` i [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` i [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), returneres etter verdien, betyr tilgang til egenskapen returnerer en kopi av størrelsen på kontrollen.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: So, adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> returned from this property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen dermed den <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>eller <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Drawing.Size>returnert fra denne egenskapen påvirker ikke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control, you must set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> property, or set the Size property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: Å justere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>kontrollens, må du angi kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>egenskapen, eller angi egenskapen størrelse med en ny <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du vil beholde bedre ytelse, ikke angi den <xref:System.Drawing.Size>til en kontroll i sin konstruktør.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den foretrukne metoden er å overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > På Windows Server 2003 systemer, størrelsen på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>er begrenset av maksimalt pikselbredden bredden og høyden på skjermen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the height and width of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer høyden og bredden på kontrollen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event to handle custom layouts.
trans-unit.target: Det er best å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>-hendelsen for å behandle egendefinerte oppsett.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> events, but also in other conditions when layout might need to be applied.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>denne hendelsen oppstår som svar på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>hendelser, men også i andre betingelser når oppsettet må kanskje brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the entire control from the height and width of its client area.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer størrelsen på kontrollen for hele fra høyden og bredden på klientområdet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value representing the height and width of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> verdien som representerer høyden og bredden på kontrollens klientområdet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value representing the height and width of the entire control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> verdien som representerer høyden og bredden på hele kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control style changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen stilen endres.

trans-unit.source: The StyleChanged event occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> flags have been added or changed.
trans-unit.target: StyleChanged hendelsen oppstår når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>flagg har lagt til eller endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis stilen kontrollen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller inndata fra brukeren.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.
trans-unit.target: Stopper midlertidig oppsettet logikken for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The layout logic of the control is suspended until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Oppsettet logikken kontrollens stoppes før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SuspendLayout and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: SuspendLayout og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metoder brukes sammen undertrykke flere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>hendelser mens du justere flere attributter for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the SuspendLayout method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel du vanligvis kalle metoden SuspendLayout, og deretter angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>Egenskaper for kontrollen, og kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metode for å aktivere endringene skal tre i kraft.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to SuspendLayout for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: Det må være ingen ventende kall til SuspendLayout for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>kalles ble.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the SuspendLayout method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du legger til flere kontroller til en overordnet kontroll, anbefales det at du kalle metoden SuspendLayout før du starter kontrollene som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Etter at kontrollene er lagt til den overordnede kontrollen, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: Dette øker ytelsen for programmer med mange kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the system colors change.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når systemfargene endres.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kategorien av kontrollen i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: A tab index can consist of any valid integer greater than or equal to zero, lower numbers being earlier in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: En kategorien-indeks kan bestå av en gyldig heltall større enn eller lik null, lavere tall som tidligere i kategorien rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: If more than one control on the same parent control has the same tab index, the z-order of the controls determines the order to cycle through the controls.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mer enn én kontroll på den samme overordnede kontrollen har samme fane indeks, bestemmer z-rekkefølgen for kontrollene rekkefølgen til å bla gjennom kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: For a control to be included in the tab order, its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For en kontroll som skal inkluderes i kategorien rekkefølge, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>egenskapen må være satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container.
trans-unit.target: Indeksverdien av kontrollen i settet med kontroller i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The controls in the container are included in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller i beholderen er inkludert i kategorien rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan gi fokus til kontrollen bruker du TAB.

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Når du trykker du TAB, er inndata fokus satt til den neste kontrollen i kategorien rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: Controls with the TabStop property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller med TabStop egenskapsverdien for `false` inkluderes ikke i samlingen av kontroller i kategorien rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: The tab order can be manipulated by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Kategorirekkefølgen kan endres ved å angi kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can give the focus to the control using the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren kan gi fokus til kontrollen bruker du TAB; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property will always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen vil alltid returnere <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> for en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir objektet som inneholder data om kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the <xref:System.Object> class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: Enhver type utledet fra den <xref:System.Object>klassen kan tilordnes denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the Tag property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen Tag er satt til Windows Forms-utforming, kan bare tekst tilordnes.

trans-unit.source: A common use for the Tag property is to store data that is closely associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: For egenskapen koden brukes til å lagre data som er nært tilknyttet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains the customer's order history in that control's Tag property so the data can be accessed quickly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har en kontroll som viser informasjon om en kunde, kan du lagre en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>som inneholder kundens historikk i koden-egenskapen for denne kontrollen, slik at de kan få tilgang til data raskt.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder data om kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Text property of the control is used differently by each derived class.
trans-unit.target: Text-egenskapen for kontrollen brukes på en annen måte av hver utledede klassen.

trans-unit.source: For example the Text property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is displayed in the title bar at the top of the form, is fairly small in character count, and usually displays the application or document name.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel Text-egenskapen for et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>vises i tittellinjen øverst i skjemaet, er for stor i tegnantall, og vanligvis viser navnet på programmet eller dokumentet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: However, the Text property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> can be large and can include numerous nonvisual characters used to format the text.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Text-egenskapen for et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>kan være stor og kan inneholde flere nonvisual tegn som brukes til å formatere teksten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, the text displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> can be formatted by adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> properties, or by the addition of spaces or tab characters to align the text.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel teksten som vises i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>kan formateres ved å justere den <xref:System.Drawing.Font>Egenskaper, eller ved tillegging av mellomrom eller tabulatortegn å justere teksten.</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in pixels, between the top edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden, i piksler mellom øverste kant av kontrollen og den øvre kanten for klienten for til beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The Top property value is equivalent to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen Top tilsvarer den <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and Top property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property value of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>og egenskapen Top verdier årsaken den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>egenskapsverdi for kontrollen for å endre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the bottom edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som representerer avstanden i piksler mellom nederste kant av kontrollen og øverste kant av til beholderen klienten diagramområdet.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent control that is not parented by another Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den overordnede kontrollen ikke er overordnet av en annen Windows Forms-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is the outermost <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that the control is contained in.
trans-unit.target: Dette er vanligvis den ytterste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> som finnes i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The top-level control is defined as the parent control that is not parented by another Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: Kontroll på øverste nivå er definert som den overordnede kontrollen ikke er overordnet av en annen Windows Forms-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is the outermost <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that the control is contained in.
trans-unit.target: Dette er vanligvis den ytterste <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>kontrollen er inneholder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the control is contained on an MDI child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, then the top-level control is the Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis kontrollen ligger på en MDI underordnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>deretter kontroll på øverste nivå er flere Document Interface (MDI) overordnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: If the control is not parented on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, this property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen ikke er overordnet for et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, skal returnere egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the top-level control that contains the current control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som representerer på øverste nivå kontrollen som inneholder gjeldende kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Causes the control to redraw the invalidated regions within its client area.
trans-unit.target: Gjør at kontrollen skal tegne ugyldige dataområder innenfor det klientområdet.

trans-unit.source: Updates the bounds of the control with the current size and location.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer grensene for kontrollen med gjeldende størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control is different from the previous <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>kontrollens avviker fra den forrige <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> of the control changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>for kontrollen-endres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updates the bounds of the control with the specified size and location.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer grensene for kontrollen med den angitte størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control if different from the previous <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>av kontrollen hvis det er forskjellig fra forrige <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> of the control changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte er den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>for kontrollen-endres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>koordinaten kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>koordinaten kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Updates the bounds of the control with the specified size, location, and client size.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer grensene for kontrollen med den angitte størrelsen, plasseringen og størrelsen på klienten.

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control is different from the previous <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>kontrollens avviker fra den forrige <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> of the control changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>for kontrollen-endres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>koordinaten kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>koordinaten kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: The client <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Klienten <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The client <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Klienten <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>kontrollens.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Forces the assigned styles to be reapplied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger tilordnet stiler gjøres på nytt i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> method to get the styles to apply.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>metode for å få malen skal brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>

trans-unit.source: The styles assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> assigned to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property are reapplied.
trans-unit.target: Stiler tilordnet av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>tilordnet kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>egenskapen på nytt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control is repainted to reflect the style changes if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen er oppdatert for å gjenspeile stilendringene om nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: The UpdateStyles method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden UpdateStyles har ingen virkning hvis det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>egenskapsverdi `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updates the control in its parent's z-order.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer kontrollen i gruppens overordnede z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The UpdateZOrder method updates the position of the control in its parent control's z-order.
trans-unit.target: Metoden UpdateZOrder oppdaterer plasseringen av kontrollen i den overordnede kontrollen z-rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if this control is a newly created control that was added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>, the z-order is updated with the new control added to the back.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis kontrollen er en nyopprettede kontrollere som ble lagt til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>, z-rekkefølgen er oppdatert med den nye kontrollen som er lagt til baksiden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the wait cursor for the current control and all child controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil bruke Vent markøren for gjeldende kontroll og alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Use a wait cursor whenever you perform an operation that takes a noticeable amount of time.However, note that operations that block the UI thread will also block acursor change.Therefore, this property should only be used when performing time-consuming operations in another thread.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en Vent markør når du utfører en operasjon som tar en synlige tidsperiode. Vær oppmerksom på at operasjoner som blokkerer UI-tråden også blokkere acursor endringen. Denne egenskapen må derfor bare brukes når du utfører tidkrevende operasjoner i en annen tråd.

trans-unit.source: To change the cursor globally and immediately, seethe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre markøren globalt og umiddelbart, seethe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the wait cursor for the current control and all child controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>bruke Vent markøren for gjeldende kontroll og alle underordnede kontroller; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is finished validating.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen er validering.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is validating.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen valideres.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Når du endrer fokus ved hjelp av tastaturet (kategorien SKIFT + TAB og så videre), ved å ringe det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>metoder, eller ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen for det gjeldende skjemaet fokus hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>4.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>

trans-unit.source: Validating 5.
trans-unit.target: Validerer 5.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> 6.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>6.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>Når du endrer fokus ved hjelp av musen eller ved å ringe det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>metoden fokus hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>4.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> 5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>5.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>

trans-unit.source: Validating 6.
trans-unit.target: Validerer 6.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the Validating and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>er satt til `false`, Validating og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>hendelser er undertrykt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the Validating event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the Validating event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>er satt til `true` i Validating hendelsen representanten, skjules alle hendelser som vanligvis ville forekommer etter hendelsen Validating.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not attempt to set focus from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, Validating, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Ikke forsøk på å angi fokus fra innenfor den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, validering, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>hendelsesbehandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan føre til programmet eller operativsystemet ikke svarer.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the `WM_KILLFOCUS` topic in the "Keyboard Input Reference" section, and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the "About Messages and Message Queues" topic in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den `WM_KILLFOCUS` emnet i delen "Tastatur inndataene referanse" og "Meldingen vranglås"-delen i "Om meldinger og meldingskøer"-emnet i MSDN-biblioteket på http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control and all its child controls are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen og alle underordnede kontroller vises.

trans-unit.source: Note that even if `Visible` is set to `true`, the control might not be visible to the user if it is obscured behind other controls.
trans-unit.target: Merk at selv hvis `Visible` er satt til `true`, kontrollen kan ikke være synlig for brukeren hvis det er skjult bak andre kontroller.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control and all its child controls are displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen og alle underordnede kontroller vises; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>egenskapen er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the Width and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> property value of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i bredden og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>egenskapen verdier årsaken den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>egenskapsverdi for kontrollen for å endre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på kontrollen i piksler.

trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: The NativeWindow contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: NativeWindow i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the WndProc method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Alle meldinger som sendes til metoden WndProc etter henting filtrert gjennom den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WndProc method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: Metoden WndProc nøyaktig tilsvarer Windows `WindowProc` funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av Windows-meldinger i den [WindowProc funksjonen](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565).

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> prosessen.
